GSP33brsgor1u:3244: jīvamukhyaprāṇaliṅgān neti cen nopāsātraividhyādāśritatvād iha tadyogāt / BBs_1,1.31 /
GSP33brsgor1u:3247: sarve vāgādayaḥ prāṇā ahamahaṃ śreṣṭha iti vivadamānāḥ prajāpatimupajagmuḥ /
GSP33brsgor1u:3249: yasminnutkrānte śarīraṃ pāpiṣṭhataraṃ patiṣyati sa vaḥ śreṣṭha iti tathākrameṇa vāgādipūtkrānteṣvapi mūkādibhāvena śarīraṃ svasthamasthāt /
GSP33brsgor1u:3250: mukhyaprāṇasya tu uccikramiṣāyāṃ sarveṣāṃ vyākulatvāptau tānvāgādīnvariṣṭhaḥ prāṇa uvāca,
GSP33brsgor1u:3252: kiṃ tat, pañcadhā prāṇāpānādibhāvenātmānaṃ vibhajya etadvāti gacchatīti vānaṃ tadeva bāṇamasthiraṃ śarīramavaṣṭabhyāśritya dhārayāmītyarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor1u:3256: yadi jīvamukhyaprāṇayorliṅgādupāstatvaṃ tarhi brahmaṇo 'pi liṅgānāmuktatvādupāsanaṃ syāt /
GSP33brsgor1u:3258: naca svatantrapadārthabhedādvākyabhedaḥ kiṃ na syāditi vācyaṃ,
GSP33brsgor1u:3264: anyatra 'ata eva prāṇaḥ'ityādau vṛtterāśritvādihāpi tasya brahmaliṅgasya yogādbrahmapara eva prāṇaśabda ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor1u:3266: yasminnetau preryatvena sthitau tenetareṇa brahmaṇā sarve prāṇādivyāpāraṃ kurvantītyarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor1u:3272: yena caitanyena vāgabhyudyate svakāryābhimukhyena preryate tadeva vāgādiragamyaṃ brahmetyarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor1u:3273: tattvaṃpadavācyayoḥ svarūpato bhedasthābhyāmupalakṣyātmasvarūpābhedādekatvaṃ nirdiśyata ityāha-naiṣa doṣa iti /
GSP33brsgor1u:3283: tasyāḥ saṃbhandhīni dṛśyāni sarvāṇi bhūtāni yathaikaṃ bhavantyadhiṣṭhānacidātmanā tathā vyākhyāsyāma ityupakramyoktam-'vāgeva'ityādi /
GSP33brsgor1u:3286: arthātmakarūpaprapañcaviṣayitvamardhaṃ śarīramiti militvā viṣayitvākhyaṃ pūrṇaṃ śarīramindriyasādhyam /
GSP33brsgor1u:3287: tatra karmendriyeṣu vāgevāsyāḥ prajñāyā ekamaṅgaṃ dehārdhamadūduhat pūrayāmāsa /
GSP33brsgor1u:3290: tasyāḥ punarnāma kila cakṣurādinā prativihitā jñāpitābhūtamātrā rūpādyartharūpā parastādaparārdhe kāraṇaṃ bhavati /
GSP33brsgor1u:3292: evaṃ buddheḥ sarvārthadraṣṭṛtvamupapādya tanniṣṭhacitpratibimbadvārā sākṣiṇi draṣṭṛtvādhyāsamāha-prajñayeti /
GSP33brsgor1u:3293: buddhidvārā cidātmā vācamindriyaṃsamāruhya tasyāḥ prerako bhūtvā vācā karaṇena sarvāṇi nāmāni vaktavyatvenāpnoti,
GSP33brsgor1u:3294: cakṣuṣā sarvāṇi rūpāṇi paśyatītyevaṃ draṣṭā bhavatītyarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor1u:3295: tathāca sarvadraṣṭṛtvaṃ cidātmani draṣṭṛtvādhyāsanimittatvaṃ ca buddherdharma ityuktaṃ bhavati sarvādhāratvāndatvādiḥ brahmadharma ityāha-tā vā iti /
GSP33brsgor1u:3297: prajñā indriyajātyā adhikṛtya grāhyā bhūtamātrā vartante,
GSP33brsgor1u:3298: prajñāmātrā indriyāṇi grāhyaṃ bhūtajātamadhikṛtya vartanta iti grāhya grāhakayormithaḥ sāpekṣatvamuktaṃ sādhayati-yaditi /
GSP33brsgor1u:3300: grāhyeṇa grāhyasvarūpaṃ na sidhyati kintu grāhakeṇa /
GSP33brsgor1u:3302: tasmātsāpekṣatvādetadgrāhyagrāhakadvayaṃ vastuto na bhinnaṃ kintu cidātmanyaropitamityāha-
GSP33brsgor1u:3322: ata upāsanāvidhilubdhena 'vaktāraṃ vidyāt' 'etadevokthamupāsīta' 'sa ma ātmeti vidyāt'iti jīvaprāṇabrahmopāsanavidhayaḥ,
GSP33brsgor1u:3328: iti śrīmatparamahaṃsaparivrājakācāryaśrīgovindānandabhagavatpādakṛtau śrīmacchārīrakamīmāṃsāvyākhāyāyāṃ bhāṣyaratnaprabhāyāṃ prathamādhyāyasya prathamaḥ pādaḥ //1//
GSP33brsgor1u:3340: tadupajīvyottaraṃ pādadvayaṃ pravartata iti hetuhetumadvāvaḥ saṃgatiḥ /
GSP33brsgor1u:3349: tajjaṃ ca tallaṃ ca tadanaṃ ceti tajjalān /
GSP33brsgor1u:3368: ato jīvaliṅgaṃ balīya iti pratyudāharaṇena pūrvapakṣayati-śārīra ityādinā /
GSP33brsgor1u:3374: atra prayojanābhāve 'pi yatra prayojanaṃ tatra bhavatyeva jagadviśeṣaṇaṃ,
GSP33brsgor1u:3387: sarvatra prasidvabrahmaṇa evātropāsyatvopadeśānna jīva upāsya iti sūtrārthamāha-sarvatreti /
GSP33brsgor1u:3388: yatra phalaṃ nocyate tatra pūrvottarapakṣasidviḥ phalamiti mantavyam /
GSP33brsgor1u:3391: 'syonaṃ te sadanaṃ karomi'iti saṃskārārthasadanasya nirākāṅkṣasyāpi 'tasminsīda'iti sākāṅkṣatacchabdena parāmarśadarśanādityāha-atrocyata iti /
GSP33brsgor1u:3394: idaṃ hi liṅgadvayaṃ lokasidvaṃ jīvaṃ na saṃnidhāpayati,
GSP33brsgor1u:3404: sa ca prakṛteṣu guṇeṣvastīti vivakṣopacāra ityāha-tathāpyupādāneneti /
GSP33brsgor1u:3405: nanvidaṃ grāhyamidaṃ tyājyamiti dhīrvivakṣādīnā vede kutaḥ syādityata āha-upādānānupādāne tviti /
GSP33brsgor1u:3412: jīrṇaḥ sthaviro yo daṇḍena vañcati gacchati so 'pi tvameva /
GSP33brsgor1u:3414: sarvataḥ sarvāsu dikṣu śrutayaḥ śrotrāṇyasyeti sarvataḥ śrutimat /
GSP33brsgor1u:3420: nanu jīvadharmaścebrahmaṇi yojyante tarhi brahmadharmā eva jīve kimiti na yojyante,
GSP33brsgor1u:3432: jyāyastvādyanupapattau śārīra iti paricchedo hetuḥ sūtroktaḥ /
GSP33brsgor1u:3452: smṛtau hṛdisthasya jīvādbhedokterannāpi hṛdistho manomaya īśvara ityāha-smṛteśceti /
GSP33brsgor1u:3455: atra sūtrakṛtā satyabheda ukta iti bhrāntinirāsāyekṣatyadhikaraṇe nirastamapi codyamudbhāvya nirasyati-atrāhetyādinā /
GSP33brsgor1u:3461: arbhakaustvāt tadvyapadeśāc ca neti cen na nicāyyatvād evaṃ vyomavac ca / BBs_1,2.7 /
GSP33brsgor1u:3462: arbhakamoko yasya sor'bhakaukāḥ tasya bhāvastattvaṃ tasmādārthikamalpatvam /
GSP33brsgor1u:3467: paricechedatyāgaṃ vinā brahmatvāsaṃbhavāt tattyāge ca brahmaṇa evopāsyatvamāyātīti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33brsgor1u:3479: saṃbhogaprāptir iti cen na vaiśeṣyāt / BBs_1,2.8 /
GSP33brsgor1u:3480: brahmaṇo hārdatve 'niṣṭasaṃbhogāpatterjīva eva hārda upāsya iti śaṅkāṃ vyācaṣṭe-vyomavaditi /
GSP33brsgor1u:3491: kiñca vibhavo bahava ātmāna iti vādināmekasmindehe sarvātmanāṃ bhoktṛtvaprasaṅgaḥ,
GSP33brsgor1u:3492: svakarmārjita eva dehe bhoga iti parihāraśca tulya iti na vayaṃ paryanuyojyā ityāha-sarvagateti /
GSP33brsgor1u:3494: brahmaṇo jīvābhinnatvaṃ śrutyā niścitya tena bhoktṛtvānumāne upajīvyaśrutibādhamāha-yathāśāstramiti /
GSP33brsgor1u:3495: arthaṃ mukhamātraṃ jaratyā vṛddhāyāḥ kāmayate nāṅgānīti so 'yamardhajaratīyanyāyaḥ /
GSP33brsgor1u:3501: kintu tvaduktyā gṛhītamityāśaṅkya bimbapratibimbayoḥ kalpitabhedena bhoktṛtvābhoktṛtvavyavasthopapatteraprayojako heturityāha-athāgṛhītamityādinā /
GSP33brsgor1u:3503: brahmaṇo hārdatve bādhakābhāvacchāṇḍilyavidyāvākyaṃ brahmaṇyupāsye samanvitamiti sidvam //8//
GSP33brsgor1u:3512: so 'ttā yatra śuddhe cinmātre 'bhedakalpanayā vartate tacchudvaṃ brahma itthā itthaṃ īśvarasyāpyadhiṣṭhānabhūtaṃ ko veda /
GSP33brsgor1u:3527: guṇaścātra mṛtyūpasecanapadena saṃnidhāpitaṃ prasidvaudanagataṃ vināśyatvaṃ gṛhyate,
GSP33brsgor1u:3529: tathāca sarvasya vināśyatvena bhānālliṅgādīśvaro 'ttetyāhanaiṣa doṣa iti /
GSP33brsgor1u:3536: guhāṃ praviṣṭāv ātmānau hi taddarśanāt / BBs_1,2.11 /
GSP33brsgor1u:3539_0: sukṛtasya karmaṇo loke kārye dehe parasya brahmaṇor'dhaṃ sthānamarhatīti parārdhaṃ
GSP33brsgor1u:3539_1: hṛdayaṃ paramaṃ śreṣṭhaṃ tasminyā guhā nabhorūpā vudvirūpā vā tāṃ praviśya sthitau
GSP33brsgor1u:3539_2: chāyātapavat mitho virudvau tau brahmavidaḥ karmiṇaśca vadanti /
GSP33brsgor1u:3547: manuṣye prete mṛte sati yeyaṃ vicikitsā saṃśayaḥ paraloke bhoktāstītyeke,
GSP33brsgor1u:3552: chatripadena gantāra iva pibatpadenājahallakṣaṇayā praviṣṭāvucyete ityāha-atrocyata iti /
GSP33brsgor1u:3555: yaḥ kārayati sa karotyeveti nyāyāditi bhāvaḥ /
GSP33brsgor1u:3564: brahmakṣatrapadasya saṃnihitamṛtyupadādanityavastuparatvavadihāpi pibatpadasya saṃnihitaguhāpadāhudvijīvaparateti dṛṣṭāntena pūrvapakṣayati-kiṃ tāvaditi /
GSP33brsgor1u:3570: na cāstu kārakatvena sajātīyā budvireva jīvasya dvitīyeti vācyaṃ,
GSP33brsgor1u:3572: tathāca loke dvitīyasyāntaraṅgajātimattvadarśanājjīvasya dvitīyaścetana eveti sūtrārthamāha-saṃkhyāśravaṇe ceti /
GSP33brsgor1u:3574: gahvare 'nekānarthasaṃkule dehe sthitaṃ purāṇamanādipuruṣaṃ viditvā harṣaśokau jahāti /
GSP33brsgor1u:3576: vyoman hārdākāśe yā guhā buddhiḥ tasyāṃ nihitaṃ brahma yo veda so 'śnute sarvānkāmānityanvayaḥ /
GSP33brsgor1u:3587: tatra heturgūḍhaṃ māyāvṛtaṃ māyānupraviṣṭaṃ paścādguhāhitaṃ guhādvārā gahvareṣṭhaṃ,
GSP33brsgor1u:3589: adhyātmayogaḥ sthūlasūkṣmakāraṇadehalayakrameṇa pratyagātmani cittasamādhānaṃ tenādhigamo mahāvākyajā vṛttistayā viditvetyarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor1u:3590: ṛtapānamatre jīvānuvādena vākyārthajñānāya tatpadārtho brahma pratipādyata ityupasaṃharati-tasmādiheti /
GSP33brsgor1u:3601: anīśayā svasyeśvaratvāpratītyā dehe nimagnaḥ puruṣo jīvaḥ śocati /
GSP33brsgor1u:3604: juṣṭaṃ dhyānādinā sevitaṃ yadā dhyānaparipākadaśāyāmīśamanyaṃ viśiṣṭarūpādbhinnaṃ śodhitacinmātraṃ pratyaktvena paśyati tadāsya mahimānaṃ svarūpameti prāpnotīva /
GSP33brsgor1u:3613: nahyatra saṃsārī vivikṣyate kintu śodhitastvamartho brahmetyarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor1u:3617: nāhi jīvo buddhibhinna iti vivekamātreṇopasaṃhāro yuktaḥ /
GSP33brsgor1u:3619: avidyā viduṣi kimapi svakāryaṃ nādhvaṃsate na saṃpādayati,
GSP33brsgor1u:3625: vastuto jīvasyābhoktṛtve bhoktṛtvadhīḥ kathamityata āha-idaṃ hīti /
GSP33brsgor1u:3632: tasmāt 'ṛtaṃ pibantau'iti vākyameva guhādhikaraṇaviṣaya iti sthitam //12//
GSP33brsgor1u:3639: tadakṣisthānamasaṅgatvena brahmaṇo 'nurūpaṃ yato 'sminkṣiptaṃ vartmanī pakṣmaṇī eva gacchatītyarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor1u:3642: tadvadihāpi dṛśyata iti cākṣuṣatvānusāreṇamṛtatvādayo dhyānārthaṃ kalpitatvena neyā iti dṛṣṭāntena pūrvapakṣayati-chāyātmeti /
GSP33brsgor1u:3663: sthānanāmarūpāṇāṃ dhyānārthaṃ śrutyantare 'pyupadeśādakṣisthānatvoktiratra na doṣa iti sūtrayojanā /
GSP33brsgor1u:3672: dhyānārthaṃ bhedakalpanayā sukhaguṇaviśiṣṭasya brahmaṇaḥ prakṛtasya ya eṣa iti sarvanāmnābhidhānādantaraḥ paramātmā syāditi sūtrārthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor1u:3673: nanu prakaraṇātprabalena dṛśyatvaliṅgenopasthāpitaśchāyātmā sarvanāmārtha ityata āha-ācāryastviti /
GSP33brsgor1u:3679: sā ca sarvanāmnā prakṛtātmagrahe nirvahatītyekavākyatānirvāhakaṃ prakaraṇaṃ vākyabhedakālliṅgadbalavaditi bhāvaḥ /
GSP33brsgor1u:3682: kaṃ viṣayasukhaṃ khaṃ ca bhūtākāśaṃ brahmatvena jñātuṃ na śaknomītyarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor1u:3684: yatkaṃ tadeva khamiti sukhena viśeṣitasya khasya bhūtatvanirāsaḥ /
GSP33brsgor1u:3686: yatkhaṃ tadeva kamiti vibhutvena viśeṣitasya kasya janyatvanirāsa iti vyatirekamukhenāha-tatra khamityādinā /
GSP33brsgor1u:3693: nanvekaṃ brahmaivātra dhyeyaṃ cedbrahmapadāntaraṃ kimarthamityata āha-tatreti /
GSP33brsgor1u:3700: pṛthivyagnirannamāditya iti mama catasrastanavo vibhūtiriti gārhapatya upadideśa /
GSP33brsgor1u:3701: āpo diśo nakṣatrāṇi candramā ityanvāhāryapacana uvāca /
GSP33brsgor1u:3702: prāṇa ākāśo dyaurvidyuditi svamahimānamāhavanīyo jagādeti vibhāgaḥ /
GSP33brsgor1u:3712: śrutā anuṣṭhitā upaniṣat rahasyaṃ saguṇabrahmopāsanaṃ yena tasya yā gatiḥ śrutau smṛtau ca prasidvā tasyā atrābhidhānālliṅgaditi sūtrārthamāha-itaśceti /
GSP33brsgor1u:3716: svadharmastapaḥ tapobrahmacaryaśraddhāvidyābhirātmānaṃ dhyātvā tayā dhyānavidyayottaraṃ devayānamārgaṃ prāpyate nottareṇa pathā /
GSP33brsgor1u:3718: etadvai brahma prāṇānāṃ vyaṣṭisamaṣṭirūpāṇāmāyatanaṃ liṅgātmakaṃ hiraṇyagarbharūpaṃ,
GSP33brsgor1u:3720: ataḥ kāryaṃ brahma prāpya tatsvarūpaṃ nirguṇaṃ jñātvā mucyanta ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor1u:3721: agnireva jyotirdevatā evamaharādyā devatā eva smṛtāvuktāḥ /
GSP33brsgor1u:3722: asminnupāsake mṛte sati yadi putrādayaḥ śavyaṃ śavasaṃskārādikaṃ kurvanti yadi ca na kurvanti ubhayathāpyupāstimahimnā arcirādidevānkrameṇa gacchanti /
GSP33brsgor1u:3732: candrādvidyutaṃ gatvā tatra vidyulloke sthitānupāsakānamānavaḥ puruṣo brahmalokādāgatya kāryaṃ brahmalokaṃ prāpayati /
GSP33brsgor1u:3734: ta etatkāryaṃ brahma pratipadyamānā upāsakā imaṃ mānavaṃ manoḥ sargaṃ āvartaṃ janmamaraṇāvṛttiyuktaṃ nāvartante nāgacchantītyarthaḥ //16//
GSP33brsgor1u:3743: naca tasya svacakṣuṣā darśanaṃ saṃbhavatītyāha-ya eṣa iti /
GSP33brsgor1u:3752: nanu 'cakṣoḥ sūryo ajāyata''sūryo 'stameti'iti vākyaṃ amarā devā iti prasiddhibādhitamityāśaṅkyāha-amaratvamapīti /
GSP33brsgor1u:3755: uktāpekṣayā pañcamo mṛtyuḥ samāptāyuṣāṃ nikaṭe dhāvatītyarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor1u:3761: tathāca śāstrakaraṇako vidvadanubhava upāsanāstutyartha ucyata ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor1u:3770: 'yaḥ pṛthivyām'ityādinā devatāḥ pṛthivyādyā adhikṛtya yamayitā śrūyate /
GSP33brsgor1u:3800: vastutastu cetanasāṃnidhyājjaḍasya vyāpāro niyamanaṃ tacchaktimattvaṃ niyantṛtvaṃ /
GSP33brsgor1u:3802: nanu dehaniyanturjīvasyānyo niyantā cettasyāpyanya ityanavasthetyata āha-tasyāpīti /
GSP33brsgor1u:3810: pradhānaṃ mahadādikrameṇa kathaṃ pravartata iti tarkasyāviṣaya ityāha-apratarkyamiti /
GSP33brsgor1u:3818: śarīraś cobhaye 'pi hi bhedenainam adhīyate / BBs_1,2.20 /
GSP33brsgor1u:3822: yathā devadattakartṛkagamanakriyāyā grāmaḥ karma na devadattaḥ,
GSP33brsgor1u:3828: dṛṣṭerdraṣṭāramātmānaṃ tayā dṛśyayā dṛṣṭyā na viṣayīkuryā ityādiśruteścādṛṣṭatvādidharmāḥ śārīrasyetyāha-neti /
GSP33brsgor1u:3832: īśvarastvabhokteti na virodha iti śaṅkate-kā punariti /
GSP33brsgor1u:3841: bheda upādhikalpitaḥ śrutisūtrābhyāmanūdyata iti samādhatte-atrocyata iti /
GSP33brsgor1u:3842: bhedaḥ satyaḥ kiṃ na syādata āha-eko hīti /
GSP33brsgor1u:3854: karma vidyārūpāparavidyoktyanantaraṃ yayā nirguṇaṃ jñāyate parā socyate /
GSP33brsgor1u:3866: bhūtānāṃ yoniṃ prakṛtiṃ yatpaśyanti dhīrāḥ paṇḍitāstadakṣaraṃ tadvidyā paretyanvayaḥ /
GSP33brsgor1u:3876: atra pradhāne virudhyamāno 'saṃbhāvito vākyaśeṣaḥ śruta iti śaṅkate-nanu ya iti /
GSP33brsgor1u:3877: pañcamyantākṣaraśrutyā bhūtaprakṛteḥ pratyabhijñānātprathamāntaparaśabdoktasya jagannimitteśvarasya sarvajñatvādikamityāha-atrocyata iti /
GSP33brsgor1u:3878: 'saṃdigdhe tu vākyaśeṣāt'iti nyāyena siddhāntayati-evaṃ prāpta iti /
GSP33brsgor1u:3879: cetanācetanatvena saṃdigdhe bhūtayonau 'yaḥ sarvajñaḥ'iti vākyaśeṣādīśvaratvanirṇaya ityayuktaṃ,
GSP33brsgor1u:3887: paravidyādhigamyatvenoktasyākṣarasya bhūtayoneḥ 'akṣaraṃ puruṣaṃ vedā'ityakṣaraśrutyā vedyatvaliṅgavatyā pūrvameva brahmatvena parāmarśādityāha-yeneti /
GSP33brsgor1u:3888_0: yena jñānenākṣaraṃ bhūtayoniṃ sarvajñaṃ puruṣaṃ veda tāṃ brahmavidyāṃ yogyāya śiṣyāya
GSP33brsgor1u:3889: tarhi pañcamyantākṣaraśabdārthaḥ ka ityāśaṅkyājñānamiti vakṣyata ityāha-kathamiti /
GSP33brsgor1u:3892: anityaphalatvenāparavidyāṃ ninditvā muktyarthine brahmavidyāṃ provāceti vākyaśeṣokterityarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor1u:3897: acetanamātrasyaikāyatanamupādānaṃ tajjñānātkāryajñāne 'pi tadakāryāṇāmātmanāṃ jñānaṃ na bhavati /
GSP33brsgor1u:3898: evaṃ jīve jñāte tadakāryasya bhogyasya jñānaṃ na bhavatītyarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor1u:3900: sa brahmavidyāṃ sarvavidyānāṃ pratiṣṭhāṃ samāptibhūmiṃ brahmavidyāmuvāca /
GSP33brsgor1u:3909: 'patyurno yajñasaṃyoge'iti sūtreṇa patiśabdasya nakāro 'ntādeśo yajñasaṃbandhe vihita iti patnī,
GSP33brsgor1u:3912: etadeva karma śreyo nānyadātmajñānamiti ye mūḍhāstuṣyanti te punaḥ punarjanmamaraṇamāpnuvantītyarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor1u:3921: viśeṣaṇānna jīvo bhedokterna pradhānamiti hetudvayaṃ vibhajya vyācaṣṭe-viśinaṣṭi hītyādinā /
GSP33brsgor1u:3925: bāhyaṃ sthūlamābhyantaraṃ kāraṇaṃ sūkṣmaṃ tābhyāṃ sahādhiṣṭhānatvena tiṣṭhatīti sabāhyābhyantaraḥ,
GSP33brsgor1u:3936: bhūtānāṃ sūkṣmāḥ saṃskārā yatra tadbhūtasūkṣmaṃ īśvaraścinmātra āśrayo yasya tattathā /
GSP33brsgor1u:3938: yattu īśvara āśrayo viṣayo yasyeti nānājīvavādināṃ vyākhyānaṃ tadbāṣyabahirbhūtaṃ,
GSP33brsgor1u:3939: 'etasminkhalvakṣare gārgi ākāśa otaśca protaśca'ityotaprotabhāvenāvyākṛtasya cidāśrayatvaśruterāśrayapadalakṣaṇāyā nirmūlatvāt /
GSP33brsgor1u:3948: ucyate-ye hyavidyānānātvamicchanti tairapi pariṇāmitvena sāṃśatvamavidyāyā aṅgīkāryaṃ,
GSP33brsgor1u:3950: yasya jñānamantaḥkaraṇe jāyate tasyāntaḥ karaṇapariṇāmyajñānāṃśanaśo muktiriti /
GSP33brsgor1u:3958: nanu sūtrakṛtā śrutau pradhānādbhedavyapadeśa uktastatra kathamajñānādbhedoktirvyākhyāyate,
GSP33brsgor1u:3969: 'prāṇo manaḥ sarvendriyāṇi ca khaṃ vāyurjyotirāpaḥ pṛthivī'iti śrutiḥ /
GSP33brsgor1u:3977: yathā kaścibrahmavitsvasya sarvātmatvaprakaṭanārthamahamannamiti sāma gāyati na tvannatvādikamātmano vivakṣati,
GSP33brsgor1u:3981: eṣa sarvabhūtāntarātmā sūtrātmā etasmādbhūtayonerjāyata iti śrutyanvayena hiraṇyagarbhasyātra jāyamānatvenopanyāsādityarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor1u:3986: ato madhye 'pi sṛṣṭireva vācyā na rūpamiti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33brsgor1u:3992: sa sūtrātmā dyāmimāṃ pṛthivīṃ ca sthūlaṃ sarvamadhārayat /
GSP33brsgor1u:3993: kaśabdasya prajāpatisaṃjñātve sarvanāmatvābhāvena smā ityayogādekāralopenaikasmai devāya prāṇātmane haviṣā vidhema paricaremeti vyākhyeyaṃ,
GSP33brsgor1u:4001: karma saphalaṃ sarvaṃ śrautasmārtādikaṃ tapaśca puruṣa eveti sarvāntaratvarūpopanyāsācca bhūtayonau jñeye vākyaṃ samanvitamityarthaḥ //23//
GSP33brsgor1u:4008: prācīnaśālasatyayajñendradyumnajanabuḍilā militvā mīmāṃsāṃ cakruḥ-'ko na ātmā kiṃ brahma'iti /
GSP33brsgor1u:4011: so 'pi samyaṅna vedeti tenoddālakena saha ṣaḍapyaśvapatiṃ kaikeyaṃ rājānamāgatyocuḥ-ātmānamiti /
GSP33brsgor1u:4013: rājā tu teṣāṃ bhrāntinirāsārthaṃ tānpratyekamapṛcchat-'kaṃ tvamātmānamupāḥse'iti /
GSP33brsgor1u:4014: te ca prācīnaśālādayaḥ krameṇa pratyekamūcuḥ-divamevāhaṃ vaiśvānaraṃ vedmi /
GSP33brsgor1u:4020_1: bhavanto yadi māmapṛṣṭvā dyusūryādiṣu bhagavato vaiśvānarasyāṅgeṣveva pratyekaṃ vaiśvānaratvadṛṣṭayo
GSP33brsgor1u:4024: taṃ sarvajñaṃ sa tadupāsakaḥ sarvatra bhogaṃ bhuṅkta ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor1u:4028: suṣṭhu tejaḥ kāntiryasya dyulokasya sa sutejāḥ /
GSP33brsgor1u:4031: pṛthak nānāvidhaṃ vartma gamanaṃ ātmā svabhāvo yasya vāyoḥ sa nānāgatitvaguṇako 'sya prāṇaḥ /
GSP33brsgor1u:4032: bahulatvaṃ vyāpitvaṃ tadguṇa ākāśo 'sya saṃdeho dehamadhyam /
GSP33brsgor1u:4033: rayitvaṃ dhanatvaṃ tadguṇā āpo yasya bastirmūtrasthānam /
GSP33brsgor1u:4042: viśvasmai bhuvanāya vaiśvānaramagnimahnāṃ ketuṃ cihnaṃ sūryaṃ devā akṛṇvan kṛtavantaḥ /
GSP33brsgor1u:4045: hi yasmātkaṃ sukhaprado bhuvanānāṃ rājā vaiśvānaro 'bhimukhā śrīrasyetyabhiśrīrīśvaraḥ,
GSP33brsgor1u:4046: tasmāttasya vaiśvānarasya sumatau vayaṃ syāma tasyāsmadviṣayā śubhamatirbhavatvityarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor1u:4050: atra jāṭharo vaiśvānara iti mukhyaḥ pūrvapakṣaḥ,
GSP33brsgor1u:4052: tasya dehavyāpitvādātmatvaṃ śrutyā dyumūrdhatvādikalpanayā bṛhattvādbrahmatvamiti dhyeyam /
GSP33brsgor1u:4056: nanu nirviśeṣasya kuto viśeṣa ityata āha-atra hīti /
GSP33brsgor1u:4063: yathāgnau nikṣiptamiṣīkātūlaṃ dahyate evaṃ hāsya viduṣa ityarthaḥ //24//
GSP33brsgor1u:4071: satā rūpeṇa stuti saṃbhavānnāsadāropa iti bhāvaḥ //25//
GSP33brsgor1u:4075: śabdādibhyo 'ntaḥpratiṣṭhānāc ca neti cen na tathā dṛṣṭyupadeśād asambhavāt puruṣamapi cainam adhīyate / BBs_1,2.26 /
GSP33brsgor1u:4077: 'sa eṣo 'gnirvaiśvānaraḥ'ityagnirahasye vaiśvānaravidyāyāṃ śruto 'gniśabda īśvare na saṃbhavatītyanvayaḥ /
GSP33brsgor1u:4082_0: vājasaneyināmagnirahasye saprapañcāṃ vaiśvānaravidyāmuktvā 'sa yo haitamagniṃ vaiśvānaraṃ
GSP33brsgor1u:4082_1: puruṣavidhaṃ puruṣe 'ntaḥpratiṣṭhitaṃ veda sa sarvatrānnamatti'ityuktaṃ dehāntaḥsthatvaṃ jāṭhare saṃbhavati,
GSP33brsgor1u:4084: atra sūtre ādipadenaivāntaḥpratiṣṭhānasya grahe saṃbhavati pṛthaguktiḥ sādhāraṇaliṅgatvadyotanārthā /
GSP33brsgor1u:4086: yadyapi dyumūrdhatvādiviśeṣa īśvarapakṣapātī homādhāratvādirjāṭharapakṣapātīti pratibhānaṃ samaṃ tathāpi pārameśvaro viśeṣo jāṭhare na saṃbhavatīti balavānityata āha-athaveti /
GSP33brsgor1u:4088: imāṃ pṛthivīṃ dyāmapi te eva dyāvāpṛthivyau rodasī tathormadhyamantarikṣaṃ ca yo bhūtāgnirbhānurūpeṇātatāna vyāptavān sa dhyātavya ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor1u:4099: yo veda sa sarvatra bhuṅkta ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor1u:4100: puruṣatvaṃ pūrṇatvamacetanasya jāṭharasya netyuktvā pāṭhāntare puruṣavidhatvaṃ dehākāratvaṃ tasya netyāha-ye tviti /
GSP33brsgor1u:4101: nanu jāṭharasyāpi dehavyāpitvāttadvidhatvaṃ syādityata āha-puruṣavidhatvaṃ ca prakaraṇāditi /
GSP33brsgor1u:4107: ata eva na devatā bhūtaṃ ca / BBs_1,2.27 /
GSP33brsgor1u:4109: evaṃ jāṭharaṃ nirasya pakṣadvayaṃ nirasyati-ata eveti /
GSP33brsgor1u:4126: idamantasthatvamudarasthatvarūpaṃ nocyate kintu nakhādiśikhāntāvayavasamudāyātmakapuruṣaśarīre mūrdhādicibukāntāṅgāni vṛkṣe śākhāvatpratiṣṭhitāni,
GSP33brsgor1u:4128: ato yathā śākhāsthasya pakṣiṇo vṛkṣāntaḥsthatvaṃ tathā vaiśvānarasya puruṣāntaḥsthatvamityāha-na hīha puruṣavidhamityādinā /
GSP33brsgor1u:4137: viśve sarve narā jīvā asyātmatvena niyamyatvena vā santīti viśvānaraḥ /
GSP33brsgor1u:4141: aṅgayati gamayatyagraṃ karmaṇaḥ phalaṃ prāpayatīti agniragraṇīruktaḥ /
GSP33brsgor1u:4159: manaḥsthaṃ prādeśamātratvaṃ smṛtidvārā smaryamāṇe kalpitaṃ śruterālambanamityarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor1u:4164: saṃpatter iti jaiminis tathā hi darśayati / BBs_1,2.31 /
GSP33brsgor1u:4167: aparicchinnamapīśvaraṃ prādeśamātratvena saṃpattyā kalpitaṃ samyagviditavanto devāstameveśvaramabhi pratyaktvena saṃpannāḥ prāptavantaḥ,
GSP33brsgor1u:4170_1: mūrdhādyadhyātmāṅgeṣu vaiśvānaraṃ saṃpādayiṣyāmīti prācīnaśāladīnprati rājā pratijñāya
GSP33brsgor1u:4170_2: svakīyamūrdhānamupadiśan kareṇa darśayannuvāca-eṣa vai me mūrdhā bhūrādīṃllokānatītya
GSP33brsgor1u:4174: svakīyacakṣuṣī darśayan 'eṣa vai sutejāḥ sūryo vaiśvānarasya cakṣurityuvāca' /
GSP33brsgor1u:4175: nāsikāpadena tanniṣṭhaḥ prāṇe lakṣyate tasminnādhyātmikaprāṇe 'dhidaivaprāṇasya vāyordṛṣṭimāha-nāsika iti /
GSP33brsgor1u:4177: mukhasthaṃ mukhyaṃ tasminnadhidaivaṃ bahulākaśadṛṣṭiḥ mukhasthalālārūpāsvapsu raiśabditatadīyabastisthodakadṛṣṭiḥ cibuke pratiṣṭhā pādarūpā pṛthivī draṣṭavyā /
GSP33brsgor1u:4178: nanu guṇāvaiṣamyeṇa vidyayorbhedādagnirahasye śrutyanusāreṇa chāndogyasthaprādeśamātrakṣutiḥ kathaṃ vyākhyeyetyāśaṅkyāha-yadyapītyādinā /
GSP33brsgor1u:4180: śākhābhede 'pi sarvaśākhāsu pratīyamānaṃ vaiśvānarādyupāsanamekamiti nyāyasya vakṣyamāṇatvācca /
GSP33brsgor1u:4184: yadvā śākhābhedena guṇavyavasthāstu na vidyābheda iti bhāvaḥ //31//
GSP33brsgor1u:4190: ya eṣo 'nanto 'paricchinnaḥ ato 'vyakto durvijñeyastaṃ kathaṃ jānīyāmityatreḥ praśne yājñavalkyasyottaraṃ,
GSP33brsgor1u:4191: sa īśvaro 'vimukte kāmādibhirbaddhe jīve bhedakalpanayā pratiṣṭhita upāsyaḥ /
GSP33brsgor1u:4195: tatra ca śrutau imāmeva bhrūsahitāṃ nāsikāṃ nirucyeti bhāṣyayojanā /
GSP33brsgor1u:4199: tayormadhye 'pi viśiṣya jīvasya sthānaṃ pṛcchati katamaditi,
GSP33brsgor1u:4202: sa eṣa saṃdhirdyulokasya svargasya parasya ca brahmalokasya saṃdhitvena dhyeya ityāha-sa eṣa iti /
GSP33brsgor1u:4203: ābhimukhyenāhaṃ brahmeti vimīyate jñāyate ityabhivimānaḥ pratyagātmā /
GSP33brsgor1u:4210: iti śrīmatparamahaṃsaparivrājakācāryaśrīgovindānandabhagavatpādakṛtau śrīmacchārīrakamīmāṃsāvyākhyāyāṃ bhāṣyaratnaprabhāyāṃ prathamādhyāyasya dvitīyaḥ pādaḥ //2//
GSP33brsgor1u:4217: indrādivedyamakhilasya ca śāsitāraṃ jyotirnabhaḥ padamanidramajaṃ bhaje 'ham //1//
GSP33brsgor1u:4221: evaṃ rūḍhipadabahulānāṃ prāyeṇa saviśeṣavākyānāṃ samanvayo dvitīyapāde darśitaḥ /
GSP33brsgor1u:4222: adhunā yaugikapadabahulānāṃ nirviśeṣapradhānānāṃ vākyānāṃ samanvayaṃ vaktuṃ tṛtīyaḥ pāda ārabhyate /
GSP33brsgor1u:4225: tadvadatrāpyupakramasthasādhāraṇāyatanatvasya vākyaśeṣasthasetuśrutyā vastutaḥ paricchinne pradhānādau vyavastheti dṛṣṭāntalakṣaṇādhikaraṇasaṃgatiḥ /
GSP33brsgor1u:4231: cakārādavyākṛtaṃ kāraṇamotaṃ kalpitaṃ tadapavādena tamevādhiṣṭhānātmānaṃ pratyagabhinnaṃ jānatha śravaṇādinā /
GSP33brsgor1u:4232: anyā anātmavāco vimuñcatha viśeṣeṇa niḥśeṣaṃ tyajatha /
GSP33brsgor1u:4233: eṣa vāgvimokapūrvakātmasākṣātkāro 'mṛtasya mokṣasyāsārāpāradurvārasaṃsāravāridheḥ parapārasya seturiva setuḥ prāpaka iti mātṛvacchrutirmumukṣūnupadiśati /
GSP33brsgor1u:4235: amṛtasya brahmaṇaḥ seturiti ṣaṣṭhyā brahmaṇo bhinnatvena setoḥ śrutatvādeṣaśabdaparāmṛṣṭaṃ dyubhvādyāyatanamabrahmaiva seturiva seturityāha-amṛtasyeti /
GSP33brsgor1u:4243: yathā loke maṇayaḥ sūtreṇa grathitā evaṃ he gautama,
GSP33brsgor1u:4244: samaṣṭiliṅgātmakavāyunā sthūlāni sarvāṇi saṃdṛbdhāni grathitāni bhavantīti śrutyarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor1u:4248: upādhiparicchinnasya jīvasya sarvavastu pratyekaṃ mukhyaṃ nāstītyarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor1u:4253: laye pratiṣṭheti brahmavācisatpadena chāndogye brahmaṇa āyatanatvaśruteratrāpi tathetyarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor1u:4255: 'yasmin dyauḥ'iti vākyātpūrvottaravākyayoḥ puruṣabrahmādiśabdena brahmasaṃkīrtanānmadhye 'pi brahma grāhyamityarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor1u:4262: yasmin sarvamotaṃ tamevaikamityevakāraikaśabdābhyāṃ nirviśeṣaṃ jñeyamityuktvā hetvantaramāha-vikārānṛteti /
GSP33brsgor1u:4263: vikāre 'nṛte kalpite abhisaṃdho 'bhimāno yasya tasyānarthabhāktvena nindāśruteśca kūṭasthasatyaṃ jñeyamityarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor1u:4266: yaścoraḥ sa sthāṇuritivat yatsarvaṃ tadbrahmeti sarvoddeśena brahmatvavidhānādbādhanārthaṃ,
GSP33brsgor1u:4272_1: yadvidhāraṇaṃ tadeva vyabhicāritve 'pi setupadārthaikadeśatvāduṇatvena grāhyaṃ natu
GSP33brsgor1u:4274: atra śrutau pareṇeti śeṣaḥ vidhāraṇasya śabdārthatvaṃ sphuṭayati-ṣiñ iti /
GSP33brsgor1u:4278: yadvā dyubhvādyādhāro brahma na setuśabdārthaḥ kintvavyavahitaṃ jñānamityāha-apara iti /
GSP33brsgor1u:4285: muktairūpasṛpyaṃ pratyaktvena prāpyaṃ yadbrahma tasyātrokteriti sūtrārthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor1u:4289_0: yathā nadyo gaṅgādyā nāmarūpe vihāya samudrātmanā tiṣṭhanti tathā brahmātmavidapi
GSP33brsgor1u:4289_1: saṃsāraṃ vihāya parātkāraṇādavyaktātparaṃ pūrṇaṃ svayañjyotirānandaṃ pratyaktvena
GSP33brsgor1u:4290: idaṃ pradhānādeḥ kiṃ na syādata āha-brahmaṇaśceti /
GSP33brsgor1u:4295: na kevalamanarthanivṛttiḥ kintvatra dehe tiṣṭhanneva brahmānandamaśnuta ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor1u:4297: dhīro vivekī tamevātmānaṃ vijñāya viśuddaṃ lakṣyapadārthaṃ jñātvā vākyārthajñānaṃ kuryāt /
GSP33brsgor1u:4301: jihvāmūlaṃ ca dantāśca nāsikoṣṭhau ca tālu ca //
GSP33brsgor1u:4319: nanu 'nānumānaprāṇabhṛtāvatacchabdāt'ityekameva sūtraṃ kimarthaṃ na kṛtaṃ ubhayanirāsahetorekatvādityata āha-pṛthagiti /
GSP33brsgor1u:4328: yadyapi viśuddhaḥ pratyagātmaivātra jñeyaḥ tathāpi jīvatvākāreṇa jñāturjñeyādbhedānna jñeyarūpatvamityarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor1u:4329: evaṃ ca jīvatvaliṅgaviśiṣṭatvena jīvasya dyubhvādivākyarthatvaṃ nirasyate na śuddharūpeṇeti mantavyam // 5 // //6//
GSP33brsgor1u:4335: nanu sthityeśvarasyādanājīvasya 'dvā suparṇā'ityatroktāvapi īśvara āyatanavākyena kimarthaṃ grāhya ityata āha-yadi ceśvara iti /
GSP33brsgor1u:4342: nanu 'dvā suparṇā'ityatra buddhijīvayorukteḥ kathamidaṃ sūtramityata iti-guhāmiti /
GSP33brsgor1u:4347: adanavākyena buddhimanūdya sthitivākyena buddhyādivilakṣaṇaśuddhapratyagbrahmaṇo jñeyasyokterdyubhvādivākye tadeva grāhyaṃ,
GSP33brsgor1u:4349: nanvatrānupahito jīva ukto na paraṃ brahmetyata āha-yastviti /
GSP33brsgor1u:4362: tasmānniratiśayasukhārthinā bhūmaiva vicārya iti nāradaṃ prati sanatkumāreṇokte sati nārado brūte-bhūmānamiti /
GSP33brsgor1u:4366: bahorbhāva iti vigrahe 'pṛthvādibhyā imanic'itīmanpratyaye kṛte 'bahorlopo bhū ca bahoḥ'iti sūtreṇa bahoḥ parasyemanicpratyayasyāderikārasya lepaḥ syāt,
GSP33brsgor1u:4367: bahoḥ sthāne bhūrityādeśaśca syādityukterbhūmanniti śabdo niṣpannaḥ /
GSP33brsgor1u:4370: vākyopakramastha ātmāpi svapratipādanāpekṣo dharmitvena bhātīti saṃnihitavyavahitaprakaraṇābhyāṃ saṃśaya ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor1u:4375: pūrvottarapakṣayoḥ prāṇopāstiḥ brahmajñānaṃ ca phalaṃ krameṇa mantavyam /
GSP33brsgor1u:4377: bhūmā tu prāṇātparaṃ bhūyaḥprakṣaṃ vinaivoktaliṅgena prāṇādabhinna ityāha-kasmādityādinā /
GSP33brsgor1u:4378: prāṇādbhūya iti na dṛśyata iti pūrveṇa saṃbandhaḥ /
GSP33brsgor1u:4379: nanu 'eṣa tu vā ativadati'iti tuśabdena prāṇaprakaraṇavicchedānna prāṇo bhūmetyata āha-prāṇameveti /
GSP33brsgor1u:4380: nāmādyaśāntānupāsyānatītya prāṇaṃ śreṣṭhaṃ vadatītyativādi prāṇavid taṃ prati ativādyasīti kenacitpraśne kṛte asmīti brūyāt,
GSP33brsgor1u:4382: prāṇavidameṣa iti parāmṛśya satyavacanadhyānamananaśraddhādidharmaparamparāṃ vidhāya bhūmopadeśānna prakaraṇavicchedaḥ /
GSP33brsgor1u:4384: bhūmno lakṣaṇavacanaṃ sukhatvamamṛtatvaṃ ca prāṇe praśnapūrvakaṃ yojayatikathaṃ punarityādinā /
GSP33brsgor1u:4385: prāṇagrasteṣu prāṇe līneṣu na śṛṇoti suṣuptapuruṣa iti śeṣaḥ /
GSP33brsgor1u:4386: 'gārhapatyo ha vā eṣo 'pāno vyāno 'nvāhāryapacana āhavanīyaḥ prāṇaḥ'iti śruteḥ prāṇā agnaya iha pure śarīre jāgrati savyāpārā eva tiṣṭhantītyarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor1u:4391: sarvaṃ samarpitamiti ca sarvādhiṣṭhānaṃ prāṇaṃ svīkaroti śrutirityanvayaḥ ata ātmatvaṃ mukhyārthaṃ darśayati-saṃprasāda iti /
GSP33brsgor1u:4392: sa vā eṣa etasminsaṃprasāde sthitvā punarādravatīti prayogācca /
GSP33brsgor1u:4407: tadvato ya eṣa ityukterna pūrvānukarṣa ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor1u:4408: ya eṣa prāṇavidativadatītyanūdya sa satyaṃ vadediti vidhānānna prāṇaprakaraṇaviccheda iti dṛṣṭāntena śaṅkate-nanviti /
GSP33brsgor1u:4411: satyavacane tvabādhitārthasaṃbandhāllākṣaṇika iti nātra lakṣyavacanavidhirityāha-neti brūma iti /
GSP33brsgor1u:4412: kiñca satyena brahmaṇātivadatīti tṛtīyāśrutyā brahmakaraṇakamativāditvaṃ śrutaṃ,
GSP33brsgor1u:4413: tasya prakaraṇādbādho na yukta ityāha-śrutyā hītyādinā /
GSP33brsgor1u:4416: evaṃ satyeneti śrutyā prakaraṇaṃ bādhyamityuktvā tuśabdenāpi bādhyamāha-prakṛteti /
GSP33brsgor1u:4432: imānyati śravaṇādīni jñeyasya satyasya brahmatve liṅgāni /
GSP33brsgor1u:4433: evaṃ śrutiliṅgaiḥ prāṇasyāvāntaraprakaraṇaṃ bādhitvā prastutaṃ satyaṃ brahma bhūmapadoktabahutvadharmītyāha-tatra yaditi /
GSP33brsgor1u:4434_0: kiñca 'saṃnihitādapi vyavahitaṃ sākāṅkṣaṃ balīyaḥ'iti nyāyena saṃnihitaṃ nirākāṅkṣaṃ
GSP33brsgor1u:4434_1: prāṇaṃ dṛṣṭvā vākyopakramastha ātmā svapratipādanāya bhūmavākyāpekṣa iha bhūmā grāhya ityāha-evaṃ ceti /
GSP33brsgor1u:4441: tataḥ prāgukto bhūmā prāṇa iti śaṅkate-prakaraṇānta iti /
GSP33brsgor1u:4449: yaduktaṃ bhūmno lakṣaṇaṃ sukhatvamamṛtatvaṃ ca prāṇeṣu yojyamiti tadanūdya vighaṭayati-yo 'pyasāvityādinā /
GSP33brsgor1u:4451: tadabhāve suṣuptau tadabhāva ityasaṅgatvajñānārthaṃ praśnopaniṣadi 'na śṛṇoti na paśyati'iti paramātmānaṃ prakṛtyoktam /
GSP33brsgor1u:4465: yadbhūtaṃ bhavacca bhaviṣyacca tatsarvaṃ kasminnotamiti gārgyā pṛṣṭhena muninā yājñavalkyenāvyākṛtākāśaḥ kāryamātrāśraya uktaḥ /
GSP33brsgor1u:4466: ākāśaḥ kasminnota iti dvitīyapraśne sa muniruvāca,
GSP33brsgor1u:4469: yathā satyaśabdo brahmaṇi rūḍha iti brahma bhūmetyuktaṃ tathākṣaraśabdo varṇe rūḍha iti dṛṣṭāntena pūrvapakṣaḥ /
GSP33brsgor1u:4474: varṇasya oṅkārasya sarvāśrayatvaṃ kathamityāśaṅkya dhyānārthamidaṃ yathā śrutyantare sarvātmatvamityāha-oṅkāra iti /
GSP33brsgor1u:4485: bhūtākāśasya kāryantaḥpātinaḥ śrutasarvakāryāśrayatvāyogādavyākṛtamajñānamevākāśaḥ pradhānaśabdita iti tadāśrayatvāccākṣaraṃ na pradhānamityarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor1u:4496: tarhi śodhito jīva evākṣaraṃ na para ityata āha-nahīti /
GSP33brsgor1u:4507: paraṃ nirguṇamaparaṃ saguṇaṃ brahmaitadeva yo 'yaṃ oṅkāraḥ /
GSP33brsgor1u:4509_1: yathādhyānaṃ paramaparaṃ vānveti prāpnotīti prakṛtya madhye ekamātradvimātroṅkārayordhyānamuktvā
GSP33brsgor1u:4512: yo hyakārādimātrātraye ekasyā mātrāyā akārasya ṛṣyādikaṃ jāgradādivibhūtiṃ ca jānāti tena samyagjñātā ekā mātrā yasyoṅkārasya sa ekamātraḥ /
GSP33brsgor1u:4514: tamoṅkāraṃ puruṣaṃ yo 'bhidhyāyīta sa oṅkāravibhūtitvena dhyātaiḥ sāmabhiḥ sūryadvārā brahmalokaṃ gatvā paramātmānaṃ puruṣamīkṣata ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor1u:4517: pūrvatra pūrvapakṣatvenokte oṅkāre buddhisthaṃ dhyātavyaṃ niścīyata iti prasaṅgasaṃgatiḥ /
GSP33brsgor1u:4518: yadvā pūrvatra varṇe rūḍhasyākṣaraśabdasya liṅgādbrahmaṇi vṛttiruktā,
GSP33brsgor1u:4519: tadvadatrāpi brahmalokaprāptiliṅgatparaśabdasya hiraṇyagarbhe vṛttiriti dṛṣṭāntena pūrvapakṣayati-tatrāparamiti /
GSP33brsgor1u:4522: sūrye saṃpannaḥ praviṣṭaḥ nanu vasudāna īśvara iti dhyānādvindate vasvityalpamapi phalaṃ brahmopāsakasya śrutamityata āha-nahīti /
GSP33brsgor1u:4529: piṇḍaḥ sthūlo virāṭ tadapekṣayā sūtrasya paratvamiti samādhyarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor1u:4530: sūtre saśabda īśvarapara iti pratijñatatvena taṃ vyācaṣṭe-parameveti /
GSP33brsgor1u:4531: sa upāsaka etasmādviraṇyagarbhātparaṃ puruṣaṃ brahmāhamitīkṣata ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor1u:4534: nanvīkṣaṇaṃ pramātvādviṣayasatyatāmapekṣata iti bhavatu satyaḥ para īkṣaṇīyaḥ /
GSP33brsgor1u:4535: dhyātavyastvasatyo 'paraḥ kiṃ na syādityata āha-sa eveti /
GSP33brsgor1u:4536: śrutibhyāṃ pratyabhijñānātsa evāyamiti sautraḥ saśabdo vyākhyātaḥ atraivaṃ sūtrayojanā-oṅkāre yo dhyeyaḥ sa para evātmā,
GSP33brsgor1u:4543: dhyānasya tatphalekṣaṇasya ca loke samānaviṣayatvāddhyeya evekṣaṇīyaḥ /
GSP33brsgor1u:4545: 'sa sāmabhirūnnīyate brahmalokam''sa etasmājjīvaghanāt'ityetatpadena saṃnihitataro brahmalokasvāmī parāmṛśyata iti praśnapūrvakaṃ vyācaṣṭe-kastarhītyādinā /
GSP33brsgor1u:4548: khilyavadalpo bhāvaḥ paricchedo yasya sa khilyabhāvaḥ /
GSP33brsgor1u:4549: etatpadena brahmaloko vā parāmṛśyata ityāha-apara iti /
GSP33brsgor1u:4551: vyaṣṭikaraṇābhimānināṃ jīvānāṃ ghanaḥ saṃghāto yasminsarvakaraṇābhimānini sa jīvaghanaḥ tatsvāmikatvātparaṃparāsaṃbandhena loko lakṣya ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor1u:4553: parapuruṣaśabdasya paramātmani mukhyatvācca sa eva dhyeya ityāha-paramiti /
GSP33brsgor1u:4554: yasmātparaṃ nāparamasti kiñcit sa evaṃ mukhyaḥ paraḥ na tu piṇḍātparaḥ sūtrātmetyarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor1u:4555: kiñca paraśabdenopakrame niścitaṃ paraṃ brahmaivātra vākyaśeṣe dhyātavyamityāha-paraṃ cāparaṃ ceti /
GSP33brsgor1u:4558: oṅkāre parabrahmopāsanayā sūryadvārā brahmalokaṃ gatvā parabrahmekṣitvā tadeva śāntamabhayaṃ paraṃ prāpnotītyavirodhamāha-atrocyata iti /
GSP33brsgor1u:4559: evamekavākyatāsamarthanaprakaraṇānugṛhītaparapuruṣaśrutibhyāṃ parabrahmapratyabhijñayā brahmalokaprāptiliṅgaṃ bādhitvā vākyaṃ praṇavadhyeye brahmaṇi samanvitamiti siddham //13//
GSP33brsgor1u:4568: asmin yatprasiddhaṃ daharamalpaṃ hṛtpadmaṃ tasminhṛdaye yadantarākāśaśabditaṃ brahma tadanveṣṭavyaṃ vicārya jñeyamityarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor1u:4577: tathehāpyākāśapadasya bhūtākāśe rūḍhatvādbhūtākāśo dhyeya iti dṛṣṭāntena pūrvapakṣayati-tatrākāśetyādinā /
GSP33brsgor1u:4578: daharavākyasyānantaraprajāpativākyasya ca saguṇe nirguṇe ca samanvayokteḥ śrutyādisaṃgatayaḥ /
GSP33brsgor1u:4582: atra tasmin 'yadantastadanveṣṭavyam'ityākāśāntaḥ sthasyānveṣṭavyatvādiliṅganvayena daharākāśasya brahmatve spaṣṭaliṅgābhāvāt /
GSP33brsgor1u:4586: ubhāvagniśca vāyuśca'ityādinā śrutasarvāśrayatvaṃ ca kathamityāśaṅkya krameṇa pariharati-tasyetyādinā /
GSP33brsgor1u:4590: nanu 'eṣa ātmā'ityātmaśabdo bhūte na yukta ityarūcerāha-athaveti /
GSP33brsgor1u:4599: nanu jīvasyākāśapadārthatvamayuktamityāśaṅkya tarhi bhūtākāśa eva daharo 'stu tasminnantaḥsthaṃ kiñciddhyeyamiti pakṣāntaramāha-na cātreti /
GSP33brsgor1u:4602: yadvā anveṣyatvādiliṅgāddaharasya brahmatvaniścayāt 'ākāśastalliṅgāt'ityanena gatārthatvamiti śaṅkātra nirasanīyā /
GSP33brsgor1u:4603: anveṣyatvādeḥ paraviśeṇatvena grahaṇāddarahasya brahmatve liṅgaṃ nāstītyarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor1u:4607: hṛdayameva tāvadalpaṃ tatratyākāśo 'lpataraḥ kiṃ tadatrālpe vidyate yadvicāryā jñeyamiti,
GSP33brsgor1u:4614: na abhede sādṛśyasyānanvayena yuddhasya nirūpamatve tātparyādayamananvayālaṅkāra iti kāvyavidaḥ /
GSP33brsgor1u:4619: kiñca hārdākāśasyāntaratvātyāge alpatvena vyāpakabāhyākāśasādṛśyaṃ na yuktamityāha-apiceti /
GSP33brsgor1u:4621: nanu hārdākāśasyālpatvanivṛttau tāvattve ca tātparyaṃ kiṃ na syādityata āha-ubhayeti /
GSP33brsgor1u:4625: vigatā jighatsā jagdhumicchā yasya so 'yaṃ vijighatsaḥ /
GSP33brsgor1u:4628: na tu brahmaṇaḥ puramiti ṣaṣṭhyarthaḥ svasvāmibhāvo grāhyaḥ 'nirapekṣeṇa tatsāpekṣaṃ bādhyam'iti nyāyādityāha-atra brūma iti /
GSP33brsgor1u:4629: śarīrasya brahmaṇa tadupalabdhisthānatvarūpe saṃbandhe mānamāha-sa iti /
GSP33brsgor1u:4631: puri hṛdaye śaya iti puruṣa ityanvayaḥ /
GSP33brsgor1u:4632: nanu brahmaśabdasya jīve 'pyannādinā śarīravṛddhihetau mukhyatvānna ṣaṣṭhyarthaḥ kathañcinneya ityata āha-athaveti /
GSP33brsgor1u:4633: bṛṃhayati dehamiti brahma jīvaḥ tatsvāmike pure hṛdayaṃ brahmaveśma bhavatu,
GSP33brsgor1u:4636_0: atha karmaphalādvaurāgyānantaramiha jīvadaśāyāmātmānaṃ daharaṃ tadāśritāṃśca satyakāmādiguṇān
GSP33brsgor1u:4636_1: ācāryopadeśamanuvidya dhyānenānubhūya ye paralokaṃ gacchanti teṣāṃ sarvalokeṣvanantamaiśvaryaṃ
GSP33brsgor1u:4637: dahare uktaliṅgānyanyathāsiddhāni teṣāṃ tadantaḥsthaguṇatvādiyuktaṃ smārayitvā dūṣayati-yadapītyādinā /
GSP33brsgor1u:4644: sarvanāmabhyāṃ daharākāśamākṛṣyātmatvādiguṇānuktvā guṇaiḥ saha tasyaiva dhyeyatvaṃ vākyaśeṣo brūte tadvirodha ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor1u:4645: 'tasmin yadantaḥ'iti tatpadena vyavahitamapi hṛdayaṃ yogyatayā grāhyamityāha-tasmāditi /
GSP33brsgor1u:4650: gatiśabdābhyāṃ tathā hi dṛṣṭaṃ liṅgaṃ ca / BBs_1,3.15 /
GSP33brsgor1u:4652: prajā jīvā etaṃ hṛdayasthaṃ daharaṃ brahmasvarūpaṃ lokamaharahaḥ pratyahaṃ svāpe gacchantyastadātmanā sthitā apyanṛtājñānenāvṛtāstaṃ na jānanti ataḥ punaruttiṣṭhantītyarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor1u:4653: nanvetatpadaparāmṛṣṭadaharasya svāpe jīvagamyatve 'pi brahmatve kimāyātamityaśaṅkya 'tathā hi dṛṣṭam'iti vyācaṣṭe-tathā hīti /
GSP33brsgor1u:4662: tatra niṣādānāṃ sthapatiḥ svāmīti ṣaṣṭhīsamāsena traivarṇiko grāhyaḥ,
GSP33brsgor1u:4664: na tu niṣādaścāsau sthapatiriti karmadhārayeṇa niṣādo grāhyaḥ,
GSP33brsgor1u:4678: nanvathaśabdāddaharaprakaraṇaṃ vicchidya śrutā dhṛtirna daharaliṅgamiti śaṅkate-kathamiti /
GSP33brsgor1u:4681: sūtre tu mahimaśabdasāmānādhikaraṇyāddhṛtiśabdaḥ ktinnanto vidhāraṇaṃ brūte,
GSP33brsgor1u:4686: dhṛteśca daharaḥ paraḥ asya dhṛtirūpasya niyamanasya ca mahimno 'sminparamātmanyeva śrutyantara upalabdheriti sūtrārthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor1u:4694: ā samantātkāśate dīpyata iti svayañjyotiṣi brahmaṇyākāśaśabdasya vibhutvaguṇato vā prasiddhiḥ prayogaprācuryam //17//
GSP33brsgor1u:4698: itaraparāmarśāt sa iti cen nāsaṃbhavāt / BBs_1,3.18 /
GSP33brsgor1u:4699: yadi 'eṣa ātmāpahatapāpmā'ityādivākyaśeṣabalena daharaḥ parastarhi jīvo 'pītyāśaṅkya niṣedhati-itareti /
GSP33brsgor1u:4702_0: ya eṣa saṃprasādo jīvo 'smātkāryakaraṇasaṃghātātsamyagutthāya ātmānaṃ tasmādvivicya
GSP33brsgor1u:4702_1: viviktamātmānaṃ svena brahmarūpeṇābhiniṣpadya sākṣātkṛtya tadeva pratyakparaṃ jyotirūpasaṃpadyate
GSP33brsgor1u:4703: yathā mukhaṃ vyādāya svapitīti vākyaṃ suptvā mukhaṃ vyādatte iti vyākhyāyate tadvat /
GSP33brsgor1u:4708: nanu kvāpyākāśaśabdo jīve na dṛṣṭa ityāśaṅkyoktāvasthotthānaliṅgabalātkalpya ityāha-yathā ceti /
GSP33brsgor1u:4709: niyāmakābhāvājjīvo daharaḥ kiṃ na syāditi prāpte niyāmakamāha-naitadityādinā /
GSP33brsgor1u:4730: yadyatreti suṣuptiparyāye ca jīvameva prajāpatirvyācaṣṭa ityanvayaḥ /
GSP33brsgor1u:4731: tatra kāle tadetatsvapanaṃ yathā syāttathā suptaḥ,
GSP33brsgor1u:4732: samyak asto nirastaḥ karaṇagrāmo yasya sa samastaḥ,
GSP33brsgor1u:4734: svapnaṃ prapañcamajñānamātratvena vilāpayati ato 'jñānasattvāt muktādvilakṣaṇaḥ prājña eṣa svacaitanyena kāraṇaśarīrasākṣī tasya sākṣyasya sattāsphūrtipradatvādātmetyarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor1u:4735: caturthaparyāye brahmoktestasyaivāpahatapāpmatvādiguṇā ityāśaṅkya tasyāpi paryāyasya jīvatvamāha-nāheti /
GSP33brsgor1u:4738: na khalu suptaḥ pumānayaṃ saṃprati suṣuptyavasthāyāmayaṃ devadatto 'hamityevamātmānaṃ jānāti /
GSP33brsgor1u:4739: no eva naivemāni bhūtāni jānāti kintu vināśameva prāpto bhavati,
GSP33brsgor1u:4740: nāhamatra bhogyaṃ paśyāmīti doṣamupalabhya punaḥ prajāpatimupasasāra /
GSP33brsgor1u:4742: etasmātprakṛtādātmano 'nyatrānyaṃ na vyākhyāsyāmītyupakramya 'maghavanmartyaṃ vā idaṃ śarīram'iti nindāpūrvakaṃ jīvameva darśayatītyarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor1u:4749: jñānātpūrvamavidyātatkāryapratibimbitatvarūpaṃ jīvatvamabhūditi kṛtvā jñānānantaraṃ brahmarūpo 'pi jīvanāmnocyata ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor1u:4753: udaśarāva ātmānamavekṣya yadātmano rūpaṃ na vijānīthastanme brūtamityādi brāhmaṇenetyāha-udaśarāveti /
GSP33brsgor1u:4754: udakapūrṇe śarāve pratibimbātmānaṃ dehaṃ dṛṣṭvā svasyājñātaṃ yattanmahyaṃ vācyamityuktaśrutyarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor1u:4758: jīvatvarūpeṇa jīvaṃ na vyācaṣṭe lokasiddhatvāt kintu tamanūdya parasparavyabhicāriṇībhyo 'vasthābhyo vivicya brahmasvarūpaṃ bodhayati,
GSP33brsgor1u:4759: ato yadbrahma tadevāpahatapāpmatvādidharmakaṃ na jīva ityuktaṃ bhavati,
GSP33brsgor1u:4772: manaḥsaṅgino hi kriyayā malanāśādabhivyaktirna tu kūṭasthasyāsaṅgina ityāha-suvarṇeti /
GSP33brsgor1u:4779: taccaitanyaṃ cakṣurādijanyavṛttivyaktaṃ dṛṣṭyādipadavācyaṃ sat vyavahārāṅgaṃ jīvasya svarūpaṃ bhavatīti tasyābhibhūtatve dṛṣṭo vyavahāro virudhyeta /
GSP33brsgor1u:4784: svarūpaṃ cejjñānina eva vyañjyeta jñānātpūrvaṃ vyavahārocchittirityarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor1u:4786: sadā vṛttiṣu vyaktasya vastuto 'saṅgasyātmana āvidyakadehādyavivekarūpasya malasaṅgasya sattvāttadvivekāpekṣayā samutthānādiśrutirityuttaramāha-atreti /
GSP33brsgor1u:4793: saśarīratvasya satyatvātsamutthānamutkrāntiriti vyākhyeyaṃ na viveka ityāśaṅkyāha-tathā viveketi /
GSP33brsgor1u:4797: nanu svakarmārjite śarīre bhogasyāparihāryatvātkathaṃ jīvata eva svarūpāvirbhāva ityata āha-śarīrastho 'pīti /
GSP33brsgor1u:4806: etadbhedasya satyatvameva nāstīti kuta ityanvayaḥ chāyāyāṃ brahmadṛṣṭiparamidaṃ vākyaṃ nābhedaparamityata āha-nāpīti /
GSP33brsgor1u:4807: yasya jñānātkṛtakṛtyatā sarvakāmaprāptistamātmānamanvicchāva iti pravṛttayorindravirocanayoryadyanātmacchāyāṃ prajāpatirbrūyāttadā mṛṣāvādi syādityarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor1u:4808: prathamavat dvitīyādiparyāye vyāvṛttāsvavasthāsu unusyūtātmā brahmatvenokta ityāha-tatheti /
GSP33brsgor1u:4820: tava tu upakrāntaparamātmanaścaturtha evoktestadbāda ityāha-bhūya iti /
GSP33brsgor1u:4825: ye tu saṃsāraṃ satyamicchanti teṣāmidaṃ śārīrakamevottaramityāha-apare tvityādinā /
GSP33brsgor1u:4829: brahmaivāvidyayā saṃsarati na tato 'nyo jīva iti śārīrakārtha ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor1u:4839: advaitamajānataḥ kalpitadvaitāśrayā vidhayo na viduṣa iti sarvamupapannamityarthaḥ //19//
GSP33brsgor1u:4844: evaṃ prajāpativākye jīvānuvādena brahmaṇa evāpahatapāpmatvādyukterjīve tadasaṃbhavānna jīvo dahara ityuktam /
GSP33brsgor1u:4852: alpaśruter iti cet tad uktam / BBs_1,3.21 /
GSP33brsgor1u:4854: evaṃ daharavākyaṃ prajāpativākyaṃ ca saguṇe nirguṇe ca samanvitamiti siddham //21//
GSP33brsgor1u:4863: yadā candrabhāskarādirna bhāsayati tadā alpadīpteragneḥ kā kathetyāha-kuta iti /
GSP33brsgor1u:4866: tatreti saptamyāḥ sati viṣaye ca sādhāraṇyātsaṃśayamāha-tatreti /
GSP33brsgor1u:4868: tathehāpi satisaptamībalādvartamānārthatyāgena yasminsati sūryādayo na bhāsyanti sa tejoviśeṣa upāsya iti bhaviṣyadarthe vṛttirāśrayaṇīyā /
GSP33brsgor1u:4869: adhunā bhāsamāne sūryādau na bhātīti virodhāditi dṛṣṭāntena pūrvapakṣayati-tejodhāturiti /
GSP33brsgor1u:4874: yasminsati yanna bhāti tadanu tadbhātīti viruddhamityata āha-anubhānamiti /
GSP33brsgor1u:4876: mukhyasaṃbhave vivakṣānupapatteḥ mukhyānubhānaliṅgātsarvabhāsakaḥ paramātmā svaprakāśako 'tra grāhya iti siddhāntamāha-prājña iti /
GSP33brsgor1u:4883: yo 'yamanukaroti sa tajjātīya iti niyamo nāstītyāha-nāyamekānta iti /
GSP33brsgor1u:4890: tatreti sarvanāmaśrutyā prakṛtaṃ brahma grāhyamityāha-na tatra sūrya iti /
GSP33brsgor1u:4892: hiraṇmaye jyotirmaye annamayādyapekṣayā pare kośe ānandamayākhye pucchaśabditaṃ brahma virajaṃ āgantukamalaśūnyaṃ,
GSP33brsgor1u:4900: satisaptamīpakṣe na bhātīti śrutaṃ vartamānatvaṃ tyaktvā tasminsati na bhāsyantītyaśrutabhaviṣyattvaṃ kalpanīyaṃ pratyakṣavirodhanirāsāya /
GSP33brsgor1u:4901: viṣayasaptamīpakṣe tu na bhāsayatītyaśrutaṇijadhyāhāramātraṃ kalpyaṃ na śrutatyāga iti lāghavaṃ,
GSP33brsgor1u:4902: ato brahmaṇi viṣaye sūryāderbhāsakatvaniṣedhena brahmabhāsyatvamucyata ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor1u:4903: yenānyābhāsyatvena hetunā sūryādayastasminbrahmaṇi viṣaye bhāsakāḥ syustathā tu brahmānyena nopalabhyate svaprakāśatvāditi yojanā /
GSP33brsgor1u:4921: puruṣaḥ pūrṇo 'pyātmani dehamadhye aṅguṣṭhamātre hṛdaye tiṣṭhatītyaṅguṣṭhamātra ityucyate,
GSP33brsgor1u:4924: yo 'ṅguṣṭhamātro jīvaḥ sa vastuto nirdhūmajyotirvannirmalaprakāśarūpa iti tamarthaṃ saṃśodhya tasya brahmatvamāha-īśāna iti /
GSP33brsgor1u:4929_1: 'smīti dhyāyediti vidhyadhyāhareṇa dhyānaparaṃ vākyamiti pūrvapakṣayati-tatra parimāṇeti /
GSP33brsgor1u:4940: bhūtabhavyasvetyupapadādbādhakābhāvācca īśāna itīśatvaśabdānniraṅkuśamīśitā bhātīti śrutyā liṅgaṃ bādhyāmiti siddhāntayati-paramātmaiveti /
GSP33brsgor1u:4948: mukhyāṅguṣṭhamātro jīvo gṛhyatāṃ kiṃ gauṇagrahaṇenetyata āha-na cānya iti /
GSP33brsgor1u:4950: atra tu śrutivirodhādasaṃbhava iti gauṇagraha ityartha /
GSP33brsgor1u:4957: arthitvādityanena niṣkāmānāṃ mumukṣūṇāṃ sthāvarāṇāṃ cādhikāro vāritaḥ /
GSP33brsgor1u:4958: tatra mumukṣūṇāṃ śudyarthitve nityādiṣvadhikāro na kāmyeṣu /
GSP33brsgor1u:4959: śuddhacittānāṃ mokṣārthitve śravaṇādiṣu vyañjakeṣvadhikāro na karmasviti mantavyam /
GSP33brsgor1u:4962: upanayīta tamadhyāpayīta iti śāstrācca na śūdrasya vaidike karmaṇyadhikāraḥ /
GSP33brsgor1u:4966_0: prāṇimātrasya sukhārthitvācca phalārthe karmaṇi paśvādīnāmapyadhikāra ityāśaṅkyoktarityāteṣāṃ
GSP33brsgor1u:4971: saṃprati tacchabdenāṅguṣṭhamātraṃ jīvamanūdyāyamīśāna iti brahmābhedo bodhya iti vaktumanuvadati-yadapīti /
GSP33brsgor1u:4977: dvividhetyādibhāṣyāttu jīvamuddiśya brahmatvabodhanamiti pratīyata iti sūtrārthāsparśitvādbhāṣyamanupapannamiti cet, na,
GSP33brsgor1u:4984: ata evopāsanāphalaṃ kaṭhavallyāmeva-'śataṃ caikā ca hṛdayasya nāḍyaḥ'ityādinā bodhitam /
GSP33brsgor1u:4985: ata eva caturthādhyāye dvitīyacaraṇe 'tadokaḥ'iti sūtre hārdavidyāṃ prakṛtya samāmananti iti bhāṣyakāraiḥ prathamavākyasya upāsye brahmaṇi tātparyamiti prakaṭīkṛtam /
GSP33brsgor1u:4992: taṃ viviktamātmānaṃ śuklaṃ svaprakāśamamṛtaṃ kūṭasthaṃ brahma jānīyādityarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor1u:4998: śāstrasya manuṣyādhikāratve devādīnāṃ brahmavidyāyamāpyanadhikāraḥ syādityāśaṅkyāha-taduparyapi bādarāyaṇaḥ saṃbhavāt /
GSP33brsgor1u:5001: atra manuṣyādhikāratvoktyā smṛtānāṃ devādināṃ vedāntaśravaṇādāvadhikāro 'sti na veti saṃdehe bhogāsaktānāṃ vairāgyādyasaṃbhavānneti prāpte siddhāntamāha-bāḍhamiti /
GSP33brsgor1u:5003: atra pūrvapakṣe devādināṃ jñānānadhikārāddevatvaprāptidvārā kramamuktiphalāsu daharādyupāsanāsu kramamuktyarthināṃ manuṣyāṇāmapravṛttiḥ phalaṃ,
GSP33brsgor1u:5005: upāsanābhirdevatvaṃ prāptānāṃ śravaṇādinā jñānānmuktisaṃbhavāditi saphalo 'yaṃ vicāraḥ nanu bhogāsaktānāṃ teṣāṃ mokṣārthitvābhāvānnādhikāra ityata āha-arthitvaṃ tāvaditi /
GSP33brsgor1u:5006: vikāratvenānṛtaviṣayasukhasya kṣayāsūyādidoṣaddaṣṭyā niratiśayasukhamokṣārthitvaṃ sattvaprakṛtīnāṃ devānāṃ saṃbhavatītyarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor1u:5007: nanvindrāya svāhetyādau caturthyantaśabdātiriktā vigrahavatī devatā nāsti,
GSP33brsgor1u:5012: nanu vigrahavattvena dṛṣṭasāmarthye satyapyupanayanābhāvācchāstrīyaṃ sāmarthyaṃ nāstītyata āha-na ceti /
GSP33brsgor1u:5013: janmāntarādhyayanabalātsvayameva pratibhātāḥ smṛtā vedā yeṣāṃ te tathā tadbhāvādityarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor1u:5014: bālādiṣu praviṣṭapiśācādīnāṃ vedodghoṣadarśanāddevayonīnāṃ janmāntarasmaraṇamastīti smṛtavedāntānāmarthavicāro yukta ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor1u:5015: devānāmṛṣīṇāṃ ca vidyādhikāre kāraṇamarthitvādikamuktvā śrautaṃ gurukulavāsādiliṅgamāha-apiceti /
GSP33brsgor1u:5026: 'tadyo yo devānāṃ pratyabudhyata sa eva tadabhavattatharṣīṇām'itivākyabādho 'pyanumānasya draṣṭavyaḥ /
GSP33brsgor1u:5029: ataḥ śrutiṣu teṣāṃ nādhikāra ityata āha-devādyadhikāre 'pīti //26//
GSP33brsgor1u:5033: virodhaḥ karmaṇīti cen nānekapratipatter darśanāt / BBs_1,3.27 /
GSP33brsgor1u:5034: nanu mantrādīnāṃ pratīyamānavigrahavattve tātparyaṃ kalpayitvā devādīnāmadhikāra uktaḥ,
GSP33brsgor1u:5036: anyaparāṇāṃ teṣāṃ pratyakṣādivirodhena svārthe tātparyakalpanānupapatterityākṣipya sūtracatuṣṭayena pariharati-virodhaḥkarmaṇītyādinā /
GSP33brsgor1u:5041: ato yogyānupalabdhyā devatāyā vigrahavatyā abhāvātsaṃpradānakārakābhāvena karmaniṣpattirna syādityāha-tadā ceti /
GSP33brsgor1u:5042: vigrahasyāṅgatvamupalabdhibādhitaṃ yuktyā ca na saṃbhavatītyāha-na ceti /
GSP33brsgor1u:5047: ato na karmaṇi virodha iti vyācaṣṭe-kasmādityādinā /
GSP33brsgor1u:5048: vaiśvadevaśastre śasyamānadevāḥ katīti śākalyena pṛṣṭo yājñavalkyo nividā 'trayaśca'ityādirūpayottaraṃ dadau /
GSP33brsgor1u:5050: ṣaḍadhikāni trīṇi śatāni trīṇi sahasrāṇīti saṃkhyoktau saṃkhyeyasvarūpapraśne,
GSP33brsgor1u:5051_0: mahimāno vibhūtayaḥ sarve devā eṣāṃ trayastriṃśaddevānāmato 'ṣṭau vasava ekādaśa
GSP33brsgor1u:5051_1: rudrā dvādaśādityā indraḥ prajāpatiśceti trayastriṃśadevāste 'pi ṣaṇṇāmagnipṛthivīvāyvantarikṣādityadivāṃ
GSP33brsgor1u:5052: ṣaṭ devāstriṣu lokeṣu trayaśca dvayorannaprāṇayordvai ca ekasminprāṇe hiraṇyagarbhe 'ntarbhavata iti darśitamityarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor1u:5054: darśanaṃ śrautaṃ vyākhyāya smārtaṃ vyācaṣṭe-tathā smṛtiriti /
GSP33brsgor1u:5068: tasya loke darśanāditi vaktuṃ vyatirekamāha-kvacideka iti /
GSP33brsgor1u:5073: śabda iti cen nātaḥ prabhavāt pratyakṣānumānābhyām / BBs_1,3.28 /
GSP33brsgor1u:5077: autpattikasūtre śabdārthayoranādyoḥ saṃbandhasyānāditvādvedasya svārthe mānāntarānapekṣatvena prāmāṇyamuktam /
GSP33brsgor1u:5078_1: jñātvā śabdasya saṃketaḥ puṃsā kartavya iti mānāntarāpekṣatvātprāmāṇyasya virodhaḥ
GSP33brsgor1u:5085: śabdasya nimittatvena brahmasahakāritvādavirodha ityāśaṅkya dvitīyaṃ kalpamutthāpayati-apiceti /
GSP33brsgor1u:5089: naca vyaktināmanityatve 'pi ghaṭatvādijātisamavāyavacchabdasaṃbandho 'pi nityaḥ syāditi vācyaṃ,
GSP33brsgor1u:5091: yathā gotvādayo gavādiśabdavācyāstathā vasutvādyākṛtayo vasvādiśabdārthā na vyaktya iti pariharati-netyādinā /
GSP33brsgor1u:5092: śabdānāṃ tadarthānāṃ jātīnāṃ ca nityatvāttatsaṃbandho 'pi nitya iti pratipādayati-nahītyādinā /
GSP33brsgor1u:5094: naca gotvāvacchedena vyaktiṣu śaktiḥ sugraheti vācyaṃ,
GSP33brsgor1u:5096: gotvaṃ śakyatāvacchedakamiti grahāpekṣayā gotvaṃ śakyamiti lāghavāt,
GSP33brsgor1u:5103: ata eva vākyavṛttau tattvamasyādivākye bhāgalakṣaṇoktā yujyate,
GSP33brsgor1u:5106_0: kevalavyaktivacanāḥ khalu ḍitthādiśabdā arthānantarabhāvinaḥ sāṃketikāḥ gavādiśabdāstu
GSP33brsgor1u:5106_1: vyaktiprabhavahetutvena prāgevasandhīti na vyaktimātravacanāḥ sāṃketikāḥ kintu sthūlasūkṣmabhāvenānusyūtavyaktyavinābhūtasāmānyavacanā iti mantavyam /
GSP33brsgor1u:5122: asṛgrudhiraṃ tatpradhāne dehe ramanta iti asṛgrā manuṣyāḥ /
GSP33brsgor1u:5124: pavitraṃ somaṃ svāntastiraskurvatāṃ grahāṇāṃ tiraḥ pavitraśabdaḥ /
GSP33brsgor1u:5129: sa prajāpatirmanasā vācaṃ trayīṃ mithunaṃ samabhavat manovāgrūpaṃ mithunaṃ saṃbhāvitavān /
GSP33brsgor1u:5139: tatra varṇānāmanityatvātsphoṭasya cāsattvānna jagaddhetutvamityākṣepe dvitīyapakṣaṃ vaiyākaraṇo gṛhṇāti-sphoṭamiti /
GSP33brsgor1u:5140: sphuṭyate varṇairvyajyata iti sphoṭovarṇābhivyaṅgyor'thastasya vyañjako gavādiśabdo nityastamabhipretyedamucyata iti pūrveṇānvayaḥ /
GSP33brsgor1u:5142: so 'yaṃ gakāra iti pratyabhijñayā varṇanityatvasiddhernānupapattirityata āha-utpanneti /
GSP33brsgor1u:5143: tāratvamandratvādiviruddhadharmavattvena tāro gakāro mandro gakāra iti pratīyamānagakārasya bhedānumānātpratyabhijñāgatvajātiviṣayetyarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor1u:5144: nanu viruddhadharmajñānaṃ dhvanyupādhikaṃ bhrama ityata āha-naceti /
GSP33brsgor1u:5145: tathāca varṇānāmanityatvānna jagaddhetutvamiti bhāvaḥ kiñca teṣāmarthabodhakatvāyogātsphoṭo 'ṅgīkārya ityāha-naca varṇebhya ityādinā /
GSP33brsgor1u:5148: tarhi varṇānāṃ samudāyo bodhaka ityāśaṅkya kṣaṇikānāṃ sa nāstītyāha-naceti /
GSP33brsgor1u:5149: varṇānāṃ svataḥ sāhityābhāve 'pi saṃskāralakṣaṇāpūrvadvārā sāhityamāgneyādiyāgānāmiveti śaṅkate-pūrveti /
GSP33brsgor1u:5158: dvitīye kiṃ pratyakṣeṇa jñāta uta kāryaliṅgena /
GSP33brsgor1u:5161: kāryamarthadhīstasyāṃ jātāyāṃ saṃskārapratyayaḥ tasmiñjāte seti parasparāśrayeṇa dūṣayati-neti /
GSP33brsgor1u:5162: padārthasmaraṇasyāpi padajñānāntarabhāvitvāttena saṃskārasahitāntyavarṇātmakapadasya jñānaṃ na yuktamityakṣarārthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor1u:5172: sphoṭe 'pi kiṃ mānamityāśaṅkyaikaṃ padamiti pratyakṣapramāṇamityāha-sa ceti /
GSP33brsgor1u:5173_0: yathā ratnatattvaṃ bahubhiścākṣuṣapratyayaiḥ sphuṭaṃ bhāsate tathā gavādipadasphoṭo
GSP33brsgor1u:5173_1: gakāradyekaikavarṇakṛtapratyayaiḥ sphoṭaviṣayairāhitāḥ saṃskārā bījaṃ yasmin citte
GSP33brsgor1u:5173_3: citte ekaṃ gauritipadamiti pratyayaḥ pratyakṣastadviṣayatayā spaṣṭamavabhāsata ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor1u:5176: yena varṇāntaravaiyarthyaṃ kintu ratnavadbahupratyayasaṃskṛte citte samyaksphoṭābhivyaktirityuktaṃ bhavati /
GSP33brsgor1u:5185: vapanānantaraṃ ta eveme keśā iti dhīrbhrāntiriti yuktaṃ,
GSP33brsgor1u:5187: sa evāyaṃ varṇa iti dhīstu pramaiva,
GSP33brsgor1u:5191: yattvayā pītaṃ jalaṃ tadeva mayā pītamityādau /
GSP33brsgor1u:5192: na tatheha vyaktibhedaḥ siddha iti pariharati-na /
GSP33brsgor1u:5205: nanu vāyusaṃyogāderatīndriyatvānna tadgatavaicitryasyodāttatvādervarṇeṣu pratyakṣāropaḥ saṃbhavatītyaruciṃ vadiṣyansvamatamāha-athaveti /
GSP33brsgor1u:5213: pratyuccāraṇaṃ varṇā anuvartante dhvanirvyāvartata iti bheda ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor1u:5214: anyathā vācike jape varṇeṣvavyakteṣu dhvanibuddhiḥ syāt,
GSP33brsgor1u:5215: dundubhyādidhvanau śabdatvamātreṇa gṛhyamāṇe ayamavyakto varṇa iti dhīḥ syāditi mantavyam /
GSP33brsgor1u:5216: evaṃ dhvanyupādhikatve svamate guṇaṃ vadanvāyūpādhikatve pūrvoktāmaruciṃ darśayati-evañcetyādinā /
GSP33brsgor1u:5221: evaṃ viruddhadharmakadhvanīnāṃ bhede 'pi na teṣvanugatā varṇā bhidyanta ityuktam /
GSP33brsgor1u:5223: yathā khaṇḍamuṇḍādiviruddhānekavyaktiṣvabhinnaṃ gotvaṃ tathā dhvaniṣu varṇā abhinnā evetyarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor1u:5226: yadvā udāttatvādibhedaviśiṣṭatayā pratyabhijñāyamānatvādvarṇānāṃ bheda ityāśaṅkāṃ dṛṣṭāntena nirasyati-apiceti /
GSP33brsgor1u:5227: varṇānāṃ sthāyitvaṃ prasādhya teṣāmeva vācakatvaṃ vaktuṃ sphoṭaṃ vighaṭayati-varṇebhyaśceti /
GSP33brsgor1u:5229: cakṣuṣā darpaṇayuktāyāṃ buddhau mukhavacchrotreṇa varṇayuktāyāṃ buddhau vinaiva hetvantaraṃ sphoṭaḥ pratyakṣa ityāha-jhaṭitīti /
GSP33brsgor1u:5230: yasyāṃ saṃvidi yor'tho bhāsate sā tatra pramāṇam /
GSP33brsgor1u:5231: ekapadamiti buddhau varṇā eva sphuranti nātiriktasphoṭa iti na sā sphoṭe pramāṇamityāha--na /
GSP33brsgor1u:5233: nanu gopadabuddheḥ sphoṭo viṣayo gakārādīnāṃ tu vyañjakatvādanuvṛttirityata āha--yadi hīti /
GSP33brsgor1u:5244: uttamavṛddhoktānām varṇānāṃ krameṇāntyavarṇaśravaṇānantaraṃ bālasyaikasmṛtyārūḍhānāṃ madhyamavṛddhasya pravṛttyādiliṅgānumitaikārthadhīhetutvaniścaye satyekapadavākyatvaniścayāt /
GSP33brsgor1u:5247: nanu nityavibhūnāṃ varṇānāṃ kathaṃ kramaḥ kathaṃ vā padatvajñānenārthadhīhetutvaṃ,
GSP33brsgor1u:5249_1: etatkramaitatsaṃkhyāvanta etadarthaśaktā iti gṛhītāḥ santaḥ śrotuḥ pravṛttikāle tathaiva
GSP33brsgor1u:5254: sthirāṇi gatyādisāmānyāni kramaviśeṣavanti gṛhītasaṃgatikānyarthabodhakānīti kḷpteṣu sāmānyeṣu prakriyā saṃcārayitavyā na tvakḷptaḥ sphoṭaḥ kalpanīya ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor1u:5261_0: pūrvatantrasiddhameva vedasya nityatvaṃ devādivyaktisṛṣṭau tadvācakaśabdasyāpi sṛṣṭerasiddhamityāśaṅkya
GSP33brsgor1u:5262: yajñena pūrvasukṛtena vāco vedasya lābhayogyatāṃ prāptāḥ santo yājñikāstāmṛṣiṣu sthitāṃ labdhavanta iti mantrārthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor1u:5272: vyavahārāvicchedājjñāyate ceti vedasyānapekṣatvena prāmāṇye na kaścidvirodhaḥ syāt /
GSP33brsgor1u:5273: nirlepalaye tu saṃbandhanāśāt punaḥ sṛṣṭau kenacitpuṃsā saṃketaḥ kartavya iti puruṣabuddhisāpekṣatvena vedasyāprāmāṇyaṃ,
GSP33brsgor1u:5277: tathāca saṃskārātmanā śabdārthatatsaṃbandhānāṃ satāmeva punaḥ sṛṣṭāvabhivyakternānityatvam /
GSP33brsgor1u:5279: viṣamasṛṣṭau hi saṃketāpekṣā na tulyasṛṣṭāviti pariharati-tatredamityādinā /
GSP33brsgor1u:5282: nanvastvanādisaṃsāre saṃbandhasyānāditvaṃ tathāpi mahāpralayavyavadhānādasmaraṇe kathaṃ vedārthavyavahāraḥ,
GSP33brsgor1u:5287: atha tadā suṣuptau prāṇe paramātmani jīva ekībhavati enaṃ prāṇaṃ sa jīvaḥ tadaitīti śeṣaḥ /
GSP33brsgor1u:5291: svapnavatkalpitasyājñātasattvābhāvāt darśanaṃ sṛṣṭiḥ adarśanaṃ laya iti dṛṣṭisṛṣṭipakṣaḥ śrutyabhipreta iti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33brsgor1u:5297: iti yadyapi tathāpi na prākṛtavaditi yojanā /
GSP33brsgor1u:5299: bādhābhāvāditi nyāyānugṛhītaśrutyādibhiḥ sāmānyato dṛṣṭānumānaṃ bādhyamityāha-yathā hītyādinā /
GSP33brsgor1u:5300: nanu tathāpi pūrvakalpeśvarāṇāṃ muktatvādasminkalpe ko 'nusaṃdhātetyata āha-tataśceti /
GSP33brsgor1u:5304_0: pūrvaṃ kalpādau sṛjati tasmai brahmaṇe prahiṇoti gamayati tasya buddhau vedānāvirbhāvayati
GSP33brsgor1u:5304_1: yastaṃ devaṃ svātmākāraṃ mahāvākyotthabuddhau prakāśamānaṃ śaraṇaṃ paramamabhayasthānaṃ
GSP33brsgor1u:5305: na kevalamekasyaiva jñānātiśayaḥ kintu bahūnāṃ śākhādraṣṭṛṇāmiti viśvāsārthamāha-smarantīti /
GSP33brsgor1u:5307: vedāntare 'pi kāṇḍasūktamantrāṇāṃ draṣṭāro baudhāyanādibhiḥ smṛtā ityāha-pratīti /
GSP33brsgor1u:5316: tathāca jñānādhikaiḥ kalpāntaritaṃ vedaṃ smṛtvā vyavahārasya pravartitatvādvedasyānāditvamanapekṣatvaṃ cāvirūddhamiti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33brsgor1u:5336: sa eva svabhāvaḥ prakṛtirvāsaneti ca gīyate /
GSP33brsgor1u:5337: evaṃ karmaṇāṃ sṛṣṭisādṛśyamuktvā svopādāne līnakāryasaṃskārarūpaśaktibalādapi sādṛśyamāha-pralīyamānamiti /
GSP33brsgor1u:5341: avidyāyāṃ līnakāryātmakasaṃskārādanyāḥ śaktayo na kalpyāḥ manābhāvādrauravācca /
GSP33brsgor1u:5343: ato 'vidyātatkāryādanyāḥ śaktayo na santi ātmāvidyaiva tacchaktiriti siddhānta ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor1u:5346: yathā suptotthitasya pūrvacakṣurjātīyameva cakṣurjāyate tacca pūrvarūpajātīyameva rūpaṃ gṛhṇāti na rasādikaṃ,
GSP33brsgor1u:5347: evaṃ bhogya lokā bhogāśrayāḥ prāṇinikāyā bhogahetukarmāṇi saṃskārabalātpūrvalokāditulyānyeveti niyama ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor1u:5357: bhāvidṛṣṭyā yajamāno 'gniḥ annādo 'ragnirahaṃ syāmiti kāmayitvā kṛttikānakṣatrābhimānidevāyāgnaye aṣṭasu kapāleṣu pacanīyaṃ havirniruptavānityarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor1u:5359: jhrnanu yajamāno 'gnirbhāvī uddeśyāgninā samānanāmarūpaḥ kalpāntare bhavati /
GSP33brsgor1u:5360: evaṃ 'rudro vā akāmayata''viṣṇurvā akāmayata'ityatrāpi tathā vaktavyaṃ,
GSP33brsgor1u:5370: tasmājjanmanāśavadvigrahāṅgīkāre 'pi karmaṇi śabde ca virodhābhāvāddevānāmasti vidyādhikāra iti sthitam //30//
GSP33brsgor1u:5380: dyulokākhyavaṃśadaṇḍe antarikṣarūpe madhvapūpe sthita ādityo devānāṃ modanānmadhviva madhvityāropya dhyānaṃ kāryam /
GSP33brsgor1u:5383: astu vasvādīnāṃ tatrādhikāra ityāśaṅkya teṣāmapi tatra dhyeyatvātprāpyatvācca na dhyātṛtvamityāha-punaśceti /
GSP33brsgor1u:5385_0: tebhyaḥ somājyādidravyāṇi hutāni lohitaśuklakṛṣṇaparaḥ kṛṣṇagopyākhyāni pañcāmṛtāni
GSP33brsgor1u:5391: ekā vāgiti saptasvindriyeṣu śiraścamasatīrastheṣu saptarṣidhyānaṃ kāryamityāha-tathemāveveti /
GSP33brsgor1u:5402: kiñca vigrahābhāvāddevādīnāṃ na kvāpyadhikāra ityāha-jyotiṣi bhāvācceti /
GSP33brsgor1u:5403: ādityaḥ sūryaścandraḥ śukro 'ṅgāraka ityādiśabdānāṃ jyotiḥpiṇḍeṣu prayogasya bhāvātsattvānna vigrahavāndevaḥ kaścidastītyarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor1u:5417: vigraho haviṣāṃ bhoga aiśvaryaṃ ca prasannatā /
GSP33brsgor1u:5423: vrīhyādivadprayogavidhigṛhītā mantrāḥ prayogasaṃbanddhābhidhānārthā nājñātavigrahādiparā iti mīmāṃsakā ācakṣata ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor1u:5437: yatra yasyādhikāraḥ saṃbhavati sa tatrādhikārīti nyāyastulya ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor1u:5438: yataḥ sarveṣāṃ sarvatrādhikāro na saṃbhavati tato na cāpodyetatyanvayaḥ /
GSP33brsgor1u:5439: tadbrahma yo yo devādīnāṃ madhye pratyaktvenābudhyata sa tadbrahmābhavadityarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor1u:5441: tata indravirocanau surāsurarājau prajāpatiṃ brahmavidyāpradaṃ jagmaturiti ca liṅgamastītyarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor1u:5442: kimatra brahmāmṛtamiti gandharvapraśne yājñavalkya uvāca tamiti mokṣadharmeṣu śrutaṃ devādīnāmadhikāraliṅgamityāha-smārtamiti /
GSP33brsgor1u:5443: yathā bālānāṃ golakeṣu cakṣurādipadaprayoge 'pi śāstrajñairgolakātiriktendriyāṇi svīkriyante,
GSP33brsgor1u:5444: yathā jyotirādau sūryādiśabdaprayoge 'pi vigrahavaddevatā svīkāryā ityāha-jyotirādīti /
GSP33brsgor1u:5454: muniṃ meṣo bhūtvā jahāreti jñāpanārthaṃ meṣa,
GSP33brsgor1u:5461: mantrādikaṃ padaśaktyā bhāsamānavigrahādau svārthe na pramāṇaṃ,
GSP33brsgor1u:5464: anyaparādapi vākyādbādhābhāve svārtho grāhya ityāha-atra brūma iti /
GSP33brsgor1u:5466: tṛṇādau pratyayo 'sti vigrahādau sa nāstīti vaiṣamyaṃ śaṅkate-atrāheti /
GSP33brsgor1u:5474: nañpadamekaṃ yadā surāṃ pibediti padābhyāmanveti tadā padaikavākyamekamevārthānubhavaṃ karoti natu padadvayaṃ pṛthaksurāpānaṃ bodhayati,
GSP33brsgor1u:5476: arthavādastu bhūtārthasaṃsargaṃ stutidvāraṃ bodhayanvidhinā vākyaikavākyatāṃ bhajata ityasti vigrahādyanubhava ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor1u:5482: yatra 'vajrahastaḥ purandaraḥ'ityādau mānāntarasaṃvādavisaṃvādau na stastatra bhūtārthavāda ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor1u:5490: nanu kleśātmake karmaṇi vidhiḥ phalaṃ vinānupapanna iti bhavatu 'yanna duḥkhena saṃbhinnam'ityarthavādasiddhaḥ svargo vidhipramāṇakaḥ /
GSP33brsgor1u:5493: uddiśya tyāgānupapattyā cetasyāroho 'ṅgīkārya ityatra śrutimapyāha-yasyā iti /
GSP33brsgor1u:5497: kiñca suprasannavigrahavaddevatāṃ tyaktvā śabdamātraṃ devateti bhaktirayuktetyāha-naca śabdeti /
GSP33brsgor1u:5498: na cākṛtimātraṃ śabdaśakyamastu kiṃ vigraheṇeti vācyaṃ,
GSP33brsgor1u:5510: tathā kṣatriyābhāvaṃ varṇāśramābhāvaṃ varṇāśramādyavyavasthāṃ ca brūyāt,
GSP33brsgor1u:5516_1: pṛthivyādipañcake samutthite dhāraṇayā jite yogaguṇe cāṇimādike pravṛtte yogābhivyaktaṃ
GSP33brsgor1u:5516_2: tejomayaṃ śarīraṃ prāptasya yogino na rogādisparśa ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor1u:5520: ekameva devādīnāṃ brahmavidyādhikāre satyeva devatyaprāptidvārā kramamuktiphalānyupāsanāni yujyante /
GSP33brsgor1u:5526: śugasya tadanādaraśravaṇāt tadādravaṇāt sūcyate hi / BBs_1,3.34 /
GSP33brsgor1u:5529: pūrvatra devādīnāmadhikārasidhyaryaṃ mantrādīnāṃ bhūtārthe vigrahādau samanvayoktyā vedāntānāmapi bhūtārthe brahmaṇi samanvayo dṛḍhīkṛtaḥ /
GSP33brsgor1u:5530: atrāpi śūdraśabdasya śrautasya kṣatriye samanvayoktyā sa dṛḍhīkriyata ityadhikaraṇadvayasya prāsaṅgikasyāsminsamanvayādhyāye 'ntarbhāva iti mantavyam /
GSP33brsgor1u:5534: sa kiṃ śūdramadhikīroti na veti saṃbhavāsaṃbhavābhyāṃ saṃdehe pūrvapakṣamāha-tatra śūdrasyāpītyādinā /
GSP33brsgor1u:5537: jānaśrutiḥ kila ṣaṭ śatāni gavāṃ rathaṃ ca raikāya gurave nivedya māṃ śikṣayetyuvāca /
GSP33brsgor1u:5540: hāreṇa niṣkeṇa yukta itvā gantā ratho hāretvā sa ca gobhiḥ saha he śūdra,
GSP33brsgor1u:5545: adhyayanavidhinā saṃskṛto vedastadutthamāpātajñānaṃ ca vedārthavicāreṣu śāstrīyaṃ sāmarthyaṃ tadabhāvācchūdrasyārthitvādisaṃbhavanyāyāsiddhernāsti vedāntavicārādhikāra ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor1u:5546: yadvādhyayanasaṃskṛtena vedena vidito niścito vedārtho yena tasya vedārtheṣu vidhiṣvadhikāro nānyasya,
GSP33brsgor1u:5559: tarhi śūdraśabdasyātra śrutasya kor'tha ityāśaṅkya sūtreṇārthamāha-śakyate cetyādinā /
GSP33brsgor1u:5560: jānaśrutirnāma rājā nidāghasamaye rātrau prāsādatale suṣvāpa,
GSP33brsgor1u:5561: tadā tadīyānnadānādiguṇagaṇatoṣitā ṛṣayo 'sya hitārthaṃ haṃsā bhūtvā mālārūpeṇa tasyoparyājagmuḥ,
GSP33brsgor1u:5564: kiṃ na paśyasi jānaśruterasya tejaḥ svargaṃ vyāpya sthitaṃ,
GSP33brsgor1u:5569: sayugvānaṃ yugva gantrī śakaṭī tayā saha sthitaṃ raikvamivaitadvacanamāttha /
GSP33brsgor1u:5570: raikvasya hi brahmiṣṭhasya tejo duratikramaṃ nāsyānātmajñasyetyarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor1u:5571: asmadvacanakhinno rājā śakaṭaliṅgena raikaṃ jñātvā vidyāvānbhaviṣyatīti haṃsānāmabhiprāyaḥ /
GSP33brsgor1u:5575: sā śūdraśabdena raikveṇa sūcyate hīti sūtrānvayaḥ /
GSP33brsgor1u:5576: śrutayaugikārthalābhe sati ananvitarūḍhyarthastyājya iti nyāyadyotanārtho hiśabdaḥ /
GSP33brsgor1u:5587: śunakasyāpatyaṃ kapigotraṃ purohitamabhipratārināmakaṃ rājānaṃ ca kakṣasenasyāpatyaṃ sūdena pariviṣyamāṇau tau bhoktumupaviṣṭau baṭurbhikṣitavānityarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor1u:5588: nanvasya caitrarathitvaṃ na śrutamityata āha-caitrarathitvaṃ ceti /
GSP33brsgor1u:5589: etena dvirātreṇeti chāndogyaśrutyaiva pūrvaṃ citrarathasya kāpeyayoga uktaḥ /
GSP33brsgor1u:5591: rājavaṃśyānāṃ hi prāyeṇa purohitavaṃśyā yājakā bhavantītyarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor1u:5596: kṣattā sūtastasya raikvānveṣaṇāya preṣaṇaṃ annagodānādikaṃ ca jānaśruteḥ kṣatriyatve liṅgam //35//
GSP33brsgor1u:5601: atra śūdraśabdo yaugika eveti na śūdrasyādhikāra iti sthitam /
GSP33brsgor1u:5604: iha vidyāgrahaṇāṅgasyopanayanasaṃskārasya sarvatra parāmarśācchūdrasya tadabhāvānna vidyādhikāraḥ ityucyate /
GSP33brsgor1u:5609: brahmaparā vedapāragāḥ saguṇabrahmaniṣṭhāḥ paraṃ nirguṇaṃ brahmānveṣamāṇā eṣa pippalādastajjijñāsitaṃ sarvaṃ vakṣyatīti niścitya te bharadvājādayaḥ ṣaḍ ṛṣayastamupagatā ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor1u:5610: nanu vaiśvānaravidyāyāmṛṣīnrājānupanīyaiva vidyāmuvāceti śruteranupanītasyāpyasti vidyādhikāra ityata āha-tānheti /
GSP33brsgor1u:5611: te ha samitpāṇayaḥ pūrvāhne praticakramira iti pūrvavākye brāhmaṇā upanayanārthamāgatā iti upanayanaprāptiṃ darśayitvā niṣidhyate /
GSP33brsgor1u:5621: taṃ mātovāca bhartṛsevāvyagratayāhamapi tava piturgotraṃ na jānāmi,
GSP33brsgor1u:5622: jabālā tu nāmāhamasmi satyakāmo nāma tvamasīti etāvajjānāmīti /
GSP33brsgor1u:5623: tataḥ sa jābālo gautamamāgatya tena kiṅgotro 'sīti pṛṣṭa uvāca,
GSP33brsgor1u:5624: nāhaṃ gotraṃ vedmi na mātā vetti parantu me mātrā kathitaṃ,
GSP33brsgor1u:5632: tadarthaṃ samidhamāhareti gautamasya pravṛtteśca liṅgānna śūdrasyādhikāra ityāha-tadabhāveti //37//
GSP33brsgor1u:5638: asya śūdrasya dvijaiḥ paṭhyamānaṃ vedaṃ pramādācchṛṇvataḥ sīsalākṣābhyāṃ taptābhyāṃ śrotradvayapūraṇaṃ prāyaścittaṃ kāryamityarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor1u:5647: siddhānāṃ siddherdurapahnavatve 'pi sādhakaiḥ śūdraiḥ kathaṃ jñānaṃ labdhavyamityata āha-śrāvayediti //38//
GSP33brsgor1u:5656: sarvaṃ jagatprāṇānniḥsṛtaṃ utpannaṃ prāṇe cidātmani prerake sati ejati ceṣṭate,
GSP33brsgor1u:5657: tacca prāṇākhyaṃ kāraṇaṃ mahadbrahma vibhetyasmāditi bhayam /
GSP33brsgor1u:5660: ya etatprāṇākhyaṃ brahma nirviśeṣaṃ viduste muktā bhavantītyāha-ya iti /
GSP33brsgor1u:5667: ataḥ prāṇopāstiparaṃ vākyamiti pratyudāharaṇena pūrvapakṣayati-prasiddheḥ pañcavṛttiriti /
GSP33brsgor1u:5669: atrāpi sarvaceṣṭābhayahetutvaṃ brahmaliṅgamastīti nāsti pūrvapakṣāvasaro gatārthatvāditi,
GSP33brsgor1u:5671: pratiṣṭhāya sthitiṃ labdhvā prāṇe vāyau nimitte jagaccalatīti prasiddham /
GSP33brsgor1u:5679: tadu nātyeti brahmānāśritaḥ ko 'pi loko nāstyevetyukārārthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor1u:5682: brahmaṇi vajraśabdaḥ kathamityāśaṅkya gauṇa ityāha-vajraśabda iti /
GSP33brsgor1u:5684: tatraiva vāyūpāstiprakaraṇaṃ samāpya 'atha hainamuṣastaḥ papraccha'iti jñeyātmānamuktvā vāyvādernāśitvokterityāha-yattu vāyvityādinā /
GSP33brsgor1u:5693: ghaṭādiviṣayāvarakatamonāśakaṃ sauramityarthaḥ pūrvatra brahmaprakaraṇasyānugrāhakaḥ sarvaśabdasaṃkocādyayogo 'stīti prāṇaśrutirbrahmaṇi nītā /
GSP33brsgor1u:5694: na tathātra 'ya ātmāpahatapāpmā'iti prakaraṇasyānugrāhakaṃ paśyāma iti pratyudāharaṇena pūrvapakṣamāha-prasiddhamevetyādinā /
GSP33brsgor1u:5697: nanu jyotiradhikaraṇe jyotiḥśabdasya brahmaṇi vṛtteruktatvātkathaṃ pūrvapakṣa ityata āha-jyotiriti /
GSP33brsgor1u:5701_0: 'tā vā etā hṛdayasya nāḍyaḥ'iti kaṇḍikayā nāḍīnāṃ raśmīnāṃ ca mithaḥ saṃśleṣamuktvā
GSP33brsgor1u:5701_1: atha saṃjñālopānantaraṃ yatra kāle etanmaraṇaṃ yathā syāttathotkrāmati atha tadā
GSP33brsgor1u:5703: tathaivātrāpi śarīrātsamutthāya mṛtvā paraṃ jyotirādityākhyamupasaṃpadya taddvārā brahmalokaṃ gatvā svasvarūpeṇābhiniṣpadyata iti vaktavyam /
GSP33brsgor1u:5705: ato mārgasthasūryopāstyā kramamuktiparaṃ vākyamiti prāpte siddhāntayati-evamiti /
GSP33brsgor1u:5706: vyākhyeyatvenopakrānta ātmaivātra jyotiḥśabdena vyākhyena iti jyotirvākyenaikavākyatāprayojakaprakaraṇānugṛhītottamarapuruṣaśrutyā vākyabhedakajyotiḥśrutirbādhyeti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33brsgor1u:5709: paratvena viśeṣitasya jyotiṣa eva sa uttama iti parāmarśenāśarīratvaniścayādityāha-paramiti /
GSP33brsgor1u:5711: nāḍīkhaṇḍe daharopāsakasya yā sūryaprāptiruktā sa na mokṣa iti yuktā sūryoktiḥ,
GSP33brsgor1u:5712_1: śrutivyatyāsena svarūpaṃ sākṣātkṛtya paraṃ jyotistadevopasaṃpadyata iti vyākhyeyamiti bhāvaḥ //40 //
GSP33brsgor1u:5723: vai nāmeti prasiddhiliṅgasyākāśaśruteśca vākyaśeṣagatābhyāṃ brahmātmaśrutibhyāmanekaliṅgopetābhyāṃ bādho yuktaḥ /
GSP33brsgor1u:5724: yatra bahupramāṇasaṃvādastatra vākyasya tātparyamiti nirṇayāditi siddhāntayati-paramevetyādinā /
GSP33brsgor1u:5728: 'anena jīvena'ityatra jīvasya brahmabhedena tatkartṛtvamucyate sākṣādayogāditi pariharati-bāḍhamiti /
GSP33brsgor1u:5734: atrākāśaśabdasya brahmaṇi vṛttiṃ siddhavatkṛtya tatra saṃśayādipravṛtteruktatvāditi na paunaruktyamiti bhāvaḥ //41//
GSP33brsgor1u:5740: ahandhīgamyeṣu katama ātmeti janakapraśne yājñavalkya āha-yo 'yamiti /
GSP33brsgor1u:5751: siddhānte jīvānuvādena tataḥ kalpitabhedabhinnasya prājñasya paramātmanaḥ svarūpaikyapramitiriti phalam /
GSP33brsgor1u:5757: puruṣaḥ śarīraṃ prājño jīva iti bhrāntiṃ vārayati-tatra puruṣa ityādinā /
GSP33brsgor1u:5763: vastutaḥ sarvavikriyāśūnya ityukterna saṃsāriṇi tātparyamityāha-yata iti /
GSP33brsgor1u:5774: hi yasmādātmā suṣuptau sarvaśokātītaḥ tasmādhṛdayasyaiva sarve śokā iti śrutyarthaḥ //42//
GSP33brsgor1u:5787: iti śrīmacchārīrakamīmāṃsāvyākhyāyāṃ bhāṣyaratnaprabhāyāṃ prathamādhyāye tṛtīyaḥ pādaḥ //3//
GSP33brsgor1u:5793: veditanyaṃ priyaṃ vande prakṛtiṃ puruṣaṃ param //1//
GSP33brsgor1u:5796: ānumānikam apy ekeṣām iti cen na śarīra-rūpaka-vinyasta-gṛhīter darśayati ca / BBs_1,4.1 /
GSP33brsgor1u:5803: tenāśabdatvanirūpaṇena brahmaṇi vedāntānāṃ samanvayo dṛḍhīkṛto bhavatītyadhyāyasaṃgatirapyadhikaraṇatrayasya jñeyā /
GSP33brsgor1u:5805_0: tatkiṃ pradhānaparaṃ pūrvoktaśarīraparaṃ veti smṛtiprakaraṇābhyāṃ saṃśaye pūrvamaprasiddhabrahmaparatvaṃ
GSP33brsgor1u:5807: tathā ca brahmapradhānayorvikalpena kāraṇatvāt brahmaṇyeva vedāntānāṃ samanvaya iti niyamāsiddhiḥ phalaṃ,
GSP33brsgor1u:5819: nanu śabdapratyabhijñāyāmartho 'pi pratyabhijñāyata ityāśaṅkya yaugikācchabdāsati niyāmake nārthaviśeṣadhīrityāha-sa ceti /
GSP33brsgor1u:5820: rūḍhyā taddhīrityāśaṅkya rūḍhiḥ kiṃ laukikī smārtā vā /
GSP33brsgor1u:5828: pūrvajñātarūpārthasya sthāne tadviruddhārthajñāne sati tasya dhīrnāstītyatra dṛṣṭāntamāha-na hīti /
GSP33brsgor1u:5831: tasya pūrvavākye ātmabuddhyormadhyasthānapaṭhitasyātrāpi madhyasthenāvyaktaśabdena grahaṇānna pradhānasya vaidikatvamiti sūtrārthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor1u:5832: smārtakramaḥ kimiti tyaktavya ityāśaṅkya śrautakramasya prakaraṇādyanugraheṇa balavattvādityāha-kuta ityādinā /
GSP33brsgor1u:5837: yadyavivekī tadā manoraśanābaddhāṃstān pravartayatīti manasaḥ pragrahatvaṃ yuktam /
GSP33brsgor1u:5840: nanu svataścidātmano bhogasaṃbhavāt kiṃ rathādinetyata āha-ātmeti /
GSP33brsgor1u:5841: ātmā dehaḥ, dehādisaṅkakalpanayā bhoktṛtvaṃ na svato 'saṅgatvādityarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor1u:5843: śarīrasya prakṛtatve 'pyavyaktapadena pradhānaṃ gṛhyatāmityata āha-tatra ya eveti /
GSP33brsgor1u:5849: tato grahebhyaḥ śreṣṭhā atigrahā viṣayā iti bṛhadāraṇyake śravaṇāt /
GSP33brsgor1u:5869: taduktau ca pradhānena kimaparāddhamityata āha-sā ceti /
GSP33brsgor1u:5871: pūrvaṃ vyaṣṭibuddhyabhedenoktātra tato bhedena paratvamucyata ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor1u:5879: kiñca brahmātmaikatvaparatve granthe bhedavādināṃ pradhānasyāvakāśo nāstītyāha-śarīretyādinā /
GSP33brsgor1u:5881: kāṭhakagranthasyaikyatātparye gūḍhatvajñeyatvajñānahetuyogavidhaye liṅgāni santītyāha-tathā caiṣa ityādinā /
GSP33brsgor1u:5931: kathaṃ tasya mahato jīvātparatvamityāśaṅkya dvitīyasūtraṃ vyācaṣṭe-tadadhīnatvācceti /
GSP33brsgor1u:5935: avyaktapadabalāt prakṛtamapi sthūlaṃ tyajyata iti śaṅkate-āmnātasyeti /
GSP33brsgor1u:5937: tava mate tasyā abhāvātkutor'thabodha iti samādhatte-neti /
GSP33brsgor1u:5938: tāṃ vināpyarthathīḥ kiṃ na syādityata āha-nahīti /
GSP33brsgor1u:5939: śarīraśabdena rūḍhyā sthūlaṃ prakṛtaṃ tasya hāniraprakṛtasya bhūtasūkṣmasyāvyaktapadena grahaṇamanyāyyaṃ syādityarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor1u:5942: ākāṅkṣayā vākyaikavākyatve sati prakṛtaṃ śarīradvayamavyaktapadena grāhyam /
GSP33brsgor1u:5947: sthūlasya dṛṣṭadaurgandhyādinā laśunādivadanātmatvadhīvairāgyayoḥ sulabhatvāditi śaṅkate-na ceti /
GSP33brsgor1u:5948: dṛṣṭā bībhatsā ghṛṇā yasmin tasya bhāvastattā tayetyarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor1u:5952: kintu vaiṣṇavaṃ paramaṃ padaṃ vivakṣitamiti taddarśanārthaṃ prakṛtaṃ sthūlamevāvyaktapadena grāhyamiti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33brsgor1u:5953: kiñca sūkṣmasya liṅgāntaḥpātina indriyādigrahaṇenaiva grahaṇānna pṛthagavyaktaśarīrapadābhyāṃ grahaḥ /
GSP33brsgor1u:5964: nahi śakyamiti ca vadadbhiḥ pradhānaṃ jñeyatvena smaryata iti saṃbandhaḥ /
GSP33brsgor1u:5965: na kevalaṃ bhedapratiyogitvena pradhānasya jñeyatvaṃ tairiṣṭaṃ kintu tasyopāsanayāṇimādiprāptaye 'pītyāha-kvacicceti /
GSP33brsgor1u:5967: upadiṣṭaṃ hi jñānaṃ phalavaditi jñātuṃ śakyaṃ niṣphalasyopadeśāyogādavyaktasya ca jñānānupadeśātphalavajjñānagamyatvāsiddhirityarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor1u:5972: asmanmate viṣṇavākhyapadasyaikasyaiva jñeyatvāttaddarśanārthamavyaktapadena śarīropanyāso yukta ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor1u:5973: sādhāraṇaśabdamātrānna pradhānasya pratyabhijñā smārtaliṅgasyānuktyā niyāmakābhāvāditi tātparyam //4//
GSP33brsgor1u:5977: vadatīti cen na prājño hi prakaraṇāt / BBs_1,4.5 /
GSP33brsgor1u:5984: trayāṇām eva caivam upanyāsaḥ praśnaś ca / BBs_1,4.6 /
GSP33brsgor1u:5986: mṛtyunā naciketasaṃ prati trīnvarānvṛṇīṣvetyukteḥ trayāṇāmeva praśno naciketasā kṛtaḥ /
GSP33brsgor1u:5990: he mṛtyo, sa mahyaṃ dattavarastvaṃ svargahetumagni smarasi /
GSP33brsgor1u:5996: yāḥ svarūpato yāvatīḥ saṃkhyāto yathā vā krameṇāgniścīyate tatsarvamuvācetyarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor1u:5997: hantedānīṃ brahma vakṣyāmīti brahmavākyena jīvapraśnādvyavahitanamapi 'yathā ca maraṇaṃ prāpya'ityādi vākyaṃ jīvaviṣayamuttaraṃ,
GSP33brsgor1u:5999: vākyārthastu ātmā maraṇaṃ prāpya yathā bhavati tathā vakṣyāmīti /
GSP33brsgor1u:6004: evaṃ ca trayāṇāmevopanyāsaḥ praśnaśca yataḥ ato na pradhānamavyaktamiti yojanā /
GSP33brsgor1u:6006: ekaḥ praśnaḥ dvau praśnau veti pakṣadvaye phalitaṃ pṛcchati-kiñcāta iti /
GSP33brsgor1u:6009: praśnaikye sūtrāsaṃgatiḥ bhede pradhānasya śrautatvasiddhiriti pūrvavādyāha-sa evetyādinā /
GSP33brsgor1u:6015: itaḥ punaḥ martyalokaṃ prāptasya mama pitā yathāpūrvaṃ sumanāḥ syāditi prathamaṃ vavre /
GSP33brsgor1u:6016: nanu dvitīyavaro jīvavidyā tṛtīyo brahmavidyeti praśnabhedaḥ kiṃ na syādityata āha-yeyamiti /
GSP33brsgor1u:6017: prete ityupakramya tṛtīyatvoktiliṅgājjīvātmavidyaiva tṛtīyo vara ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor1u:6018: evaṃ vākyopakrame sati praśnāntaraṃ na yuktamityāha-tatreti /
GSP33brsgor1u:6019: maraṇadharmādyasparśaliṅgābhyāṃ praṣṭavyayorjīveśvarayorbhedāt praśnabhedasiddhervākyabādho yukta iti śaṅkate-nanvityādinā /
GSP33brsgor1u:6021: na kevalaṃ praṣṭavyabhedāt praśnabhedaḥ kintu praśnavākyayoḥ sādṛśyābhāvādapītyāha-praśnacchāyeti /
GSP33brsgor1u:6023: kiñca brahmāpraśne janmādiniṣedhena jīvasvarūpaṃ vadan yamastayoraikyaṃ sūcayatītyāha-iha cānyatreti /
GSP33brsgor1u:6031: yena sākṣiṇā pramātā paśyati tāmātmānamiti saṃbandhaḥ /
GSP33brsgor1u:6033: kiñcābhedamuktvā bhedasya ninditatvādabheda eva satya ityāha-tatheti /
GSP33brsgor1u:6035: evamihākhaṇḍaikarase brahmaṇi yo nāneva mithyābhedaṃ paśyati sa bhedadarśī maraṇānmaraṇaṃ prāpnoti saṃsārabhayānna mucyata ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor1u:6036: kiñca jīvapraśnānantaraṃ 'taṃ durdarśam'iti yaduttaramuvāca tenāpyuttareṇābhedo gamyata iti saṃbandhaḥ /
GSP33brsgor1u:6038: putrādikaṃ vṛṇīṣvetyukte 'pi viṣayāṃstucchīkṛtyātmajñānānna cacāla 'nānyaṃ tasmānnaciketā vṛṇīte'iti śravaṇāt /
GSP33brsgor1u:6039: tadā saṃtuṣṭo yamaḥ 'anyacchreyo 'nyadutaiva preyaḥ'iti bhogāpavargamārgayorvailakṣaṇyaṃ pratijñāya 'dūramete viparīte viṣūcī avidyā yā ca vidyā'iti darśitavānityarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor1u:6045_0: yataḥ tvā tvāṃ bahavo 'pi kāmāḥ putrādayo mayā dīyamānā durlabhā api nālolupanta
GSP33brsgor1u:6045_1: lobhavantaṃ na kṛtavanta iti praṣṭāraṃ stutvā praśnamapi 'tvādṛṅgo bhūyānnaciketaḥ
GSP33brsgor1u:6046: iyaṃ praśaṃsā praśnabhedapakṣe na ghaṭata ityāha-yatpraśneti /
GSP33brsgor1u:6047: yatpraśnena stutiṃ labdhavāṃstaṃ praśnaṃ vihāya yadyanyamevotthāpayet tarhyanavasare stutīḥ kṛtā syādityarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor1u:6052: avidyānāśānantaraṃ brahmatvaṃ cedāgantukamanityaṃ ca syādityata āha-na cāvidyāvattva iti /
GSP33brsgor1u:6053: jīvasya brahmatve svābhāvike sati brahmapraśnasya yaduttaraṃ tajjīvapraśnasyāpi bhavatīti lābhaṃ darśayati-tataśca na jāyata iti /
GSP33brsgor1u:6072: 'tamasaḥ parastādi'tyādinā śokātyayatamaḥ paratvādibhyaśca mahacchabdaḥ sāṃkhyatattvaṃ nābhidhatta iti saṃbandhaḥ /
GSP33brsgor1u:6080_0: tatkiṃ pradhānaparaṃ māyāparaṃ veti rūḍhyarthāsaṃbhavātsaṃśaye pūrvatrāvyaktaśabdamātreṇa
GSP33brsgor1u:6085: avayavāḥ pradhānasya rajādayasteṣāṃ dharmā rañjakatvādayaḥ tairnimittairlohitādiśabdaiḥ pradhānamucyata ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor1u:6099: viśeṣagrahahetoḥ prakaraṇāderabhāvāditi hetuṃ vyākhyāya dṛṣṭāntaṃ vyācaṣṭe-camasavaditi /
GSP33brsgor1u:6104: jyotirupakramā tu tathā hy adhīyata eke / BBs_1,4.9 /
GSP33brsgor1u:6112: kiñca lohitādiśabdairapi dravyalakṣaṇā nyāyyā avyavadhānāt na tu rañjanīyatvādiguṇavyavahitā sattvādiguṇalakṣaṇetyāha-lohitādīnāṃ ceti /
GSP33brsgor1u:6113: nanu śākhāntareṇa śākhāntarasthamantrasya nirṇayaḥ kathamityata āha-asaṃdigdheneti /
GSP33brsgor1u:6115: yathā śākhāntaravākyānna pradhānagrahastathehāpi śvetāśvataropaniṣadi māyāprakaraṇānna tadbrahma ityāha-tatheti /
GSP33brsgor1u:6117_0: brahmavādino dhyānākhyayogena paramātmānamanupraviṣṭāḥ santaḥ tatraiva devasyātmabhūtāmaikyenādhyastāṃ
GSP33brsgor1u:6117_1: śaktiṃ paratantrāṃ māyāṃ sattvādiguṇavatīṃ brahmaṇaḥ sahāyamapaśyannityanvayaḥ /
GSP33brsgor1u:6118: māyāyā ekatve 'pi tadaṃśānāṃ jīvopādhīnāṃ tattasaṃghātayonīnāmavidyākhyānāṃ bhedādvīpsā /
GSP33brsgor1u:6146: naca yogasya mukhyavṛttitvāttena pradhānagraho nyāyya iti vācyaṃ,
GSP33brsgor1u:6149: tathāca rohitādiśabdasamabhivyāhārānugṛhītayā rūḍhyāśritayā guṇavṛttyā pradhāne yogaṃ bādhitvāvāntaraprakṛtirajāśabdena grāhya,
GSP33brsgor1u:6150: yathā madhvādiśabdaiḥ prasiddhamadhvādyāśritaguṇalakṣaṇaya ādityādayo gṛhyante tadvat /
GSP33brsgor1u:6155: na saṃkhyopasaṃgrahādapi nānābhāvād atirekāc ca / BBs_1,4.11 /
GSP33brsgor1u:6157_0: pañcajanaśabdaḥ sāṃkhyatattvaparo 'nyaparo veti yogarūḍhyoraniścayāt saṃśaye yathā
GSP33brsgor1u:6160: tatra catvāraḥ sūtraṃ annaṃ virāṭ tayoḥ kāraṇamavyākṛtamākāśaśca yasminnadhyastāstamevātmānamamṛtaṃ brahma manye /
GSP33brsgor1u:6162: nanvastu pañcatvaśiṣṭeṣu pañcajaneṣu punaḥ pañcatvānvayāt pañcaviṃśatisaṃkhyāpratītiḥ,
GSP33brsgor1u:6163: tāvatā kathaṃ sāṃkhyatattvagraha ityāśaṅkya saṃkhyāyā dharmyākāṅkṣāyāṃ tattvāni grāhyāṇītyāha-tatheti /
GSP33brsgor1u:6170: pañca tanmātrāśca pañcānāṃ sthūlabhūtānāmākāśādīnāṃ prakṛtayaḥ pañca sthūlabhūtānyekādaśendriyāṇi ceti ṣoḍaśasaṃkhyāko gaṇo vikāra eva na prakṛtiḥ,
GSP33brsgor1u:6175: pañcsu pañcasu sādhāraṇasyetarapañcakāddhyāvṛttasya dharmasyābhāvo 'tra nānātvaṃ vivakṣitamityarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor1u:6176: yadyapi jñānakarmendriyeṣu daśasu jñānakaraṇatvaṃ karmakaraṇatvaṃ ca pañcakadvaye 'sti,
GSP33brsgor1u:6178: tathāpi yasminnityātmana ākāśasya ca pṛthagukteḥ sattvarajastamomahadahaṅkārāḥ pañca kartavyāḥ,
GSP33brsgor1u:6185: yathā dvāvaśvinau saptarṣayo 'ṣṭau vasavaśceti saptadaśetyatrāśvitvādikamādāya dvitvādayaḥ praviśantiḥ /
GSP33brsgor1u:6187: pañcaśabdadvayena svavācyanyūnasaṃkhyādvāreṇa tadvyāpyā mahāsaṃkhyaiva lakṣyata iti sadṛṣṭāntaṃ śaṅkate-atheti /
GSP33brsgor1u:6188: mukhyārthasya vakṣyamāṇatvāllakṣaṇā na yukteti pariharati-tadapi neti /
GSP33brsgor1u:6195: tathāca na dvitīyapañcaśabdajanaśabdayoḥ samāsaṃ vināntyasyākārasyodāttatvaṃ pūrveṣāmanudāttatatvaṃ ca ghaṭate 'samāsasya'iti sūtreṇa samāsasyāntodāttavidhānāt /
GSP33brsgor1u:6196_0: 'anudāttaṃ padamekavarjam'iti ca sūtreṇa yasminpade udāttaḥ svarito vā yasya varṇasya
GSP33brsgor1u:6196_1: vidhīyate tamekaṃ varjayitvāvaśiṣṭaṃ tatpadamanudāttaṃ bhavatīti vidhānādeva māntrikāntodāttasvareṇaikapadatvaniścayaḥ
GSP33brsgor1u:6196_3: yo mantradaśāyāmanudāttaḥ svarito vā sa brāhmaṇadaśāyāmudātto bhavatītyapavāda āśritaḥ /
GSP33brsgor1u:6199: tathā cāntyanakārāduparitana ākāra ākāśaścetyanena śliṣṭatayā paṭhyamāno 'nudātto bhavati,
GSP33brsgor1u:6203: antānudāttaṃ hi samāmnātāraḥ pañcajanaśabdamadhīyata iti pāṭhakaprasiddhirasiddheti /
GSP33brsgor1u:6204: tathā ca pañca pañcajanā iti māntrikāntodāttaḥ svaraḥ,
GSP33brsgor1u:6205: yasmin pañca pañcajanā ityantānudātto brāhnasvara iti vibhāgaḥ /
GSP33brsgor1u:6208: ājya, tvā tvāṃ pañcānāṃ pañcajanānāṃ devaviśeṣāṇāṃ yantrāya dhartrāya gṛhṇāmi ityājyagrahaṇamantraśeṣaḥ /
GSP33brsgor1u:6209: devatānāṃ karmaṇi yantradavasthitaṃ śarīraṃ tadeva dhartraṃ ihāmitrabhogādhāraṃ,
GSP33brsgor1u:6213: janapañcakamekaṃ pañcakānāṃ pañcakaṃ dvitīyamiti pañcakadvayaṃ tasya pañcapañceti grahaṇaṃ netyakṣarārthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor1u:6226: pañcānāṃ pūlānāṃ samāhārā ityatra 'saṃkhyāpūrvo dviguḥ'iti samāso vihitaḥ /
GSP33brsgor1u:6227: tato 'dvigoḥ'iti sūtreṇa ṅīpo vidhānāt samāhārapratītau samāhārāḥ katītyākāṅkṣāyāṃ satyāṃ pañcetipadāntarānvayo yuktaḥ /
GSP33brsgor1u:6228: pañcajanā ityatra tu ṅībantatvābhāvena samāhārasyāpratīteḥ janānāṃ cādita eva pañcatvopādānātsaṃkhyākāṅkṣāyā asattvātpañceti padāntaraṃ nānveti /
GSP33brsgor1u:6231: nanu janānāṃ nirākāṅkṣatve 'pi tadviśeṣaṇībhūtapañcatvāni katītyākāṅkṣāyāṃ pañcatvāntaraṃ viśeṣaṇaṃ bhavatvityāśaṅkate-bhavadapīti /
GSP33brsgor1u:6232: nopasarjanasyopasarjanāntareṇānvayaḥ kintu pradhānenaiveti nopasarjanyāyavirodha ukta iti pariharati-tatra ceti /
GSP33brsgor1u:6244: kiṃ ca pañcaviṃśatisaṃkhyāpratītāvapi na sāṃkhyatattvānāṃ grahaṇamityāha-kathaṃ ceti /
GSP33brsgor1u:6249: pañca ca te janāśceti karmadhārayādisamāsāntarātsaṃjñāsamāsasyāptoktyā balavattvaṃ tāvadāha-ucyata iti /
GSP33brsgor1u:6250: vigvācinaḥ saṃkhyāvācinaśca śabdāḥ saṃjñāyāṃ gamyamānāyāṃ subantetottarapadena samasyante /
GSP33brsgor1u:6257: pañcajanaśabdasya saṃjñātvamuktvā saṃjñikathanārthaṃ sūtraṃ gṛhṇāti-ke punasta iti /
GSP33brsgor1u:6259: ye prāṇādiprerakaṃ tatsākṣiṇamātmānaṃ viduste brahmavida ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor1u:6260: pañcajanaśabdasya prāṇādiṣu kayā vṛttyā prayoga iti śaṅkate-kathaṃ punariti /
GSP33brsgor1u:6261: yathā tava tattveṣu janaśabdasya lakṣaṇaya prayogastathā mama prāṇādiṣu pañcajanaśabdasya lakṣaṇayetyāha-tattveṣviti /
GSP33brsgor1u:6269: janakatvājjanaḥ pradhānamiti yogasaṃbhave kimiti rūḍhimāśritya lakṣaṇāprayāsa ityata āha-samāseti /
GSP33brsgor1u:6270: yathā aśvakarṇaśabdasya varṇasamudāyasya vṛkṣe rūḍhirevaṃ pañcajanaśabdasya rūḍhireva nāvayavaśaktyātmako yoga ityarthaḥ /
